AccountServicePreference.name: AccountServicePreference
AccountServicePreference.description: Represents the preferences an account has for the services they receive. In Home Health, this object represents the preferences that a patient has for the health workers assigned to their visits.

AccountId.description: The patient whose preference is being recorded.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

PreferenceId.description: The Preference that the patient has about their health worker. This preference may be a skill or trait, or a specific person that they want to avoid or be assigned to their visit.

PreferenceOrder.description: The order of the preference selected by the patient.

PreferenceType.description: Specifies the type of preferences that’s recorded.

ServiceContextId.description: References the work type that this preference is valid for. For instance, a patient may have a certain preference that only applies to physiotherapy and another preference that only applies to wound management.

UsageType.description: Specifies the feature that the created record is applicable for.

Accreditation.name: Accreditation
Accreditation.description: Represents the professional accreditations of a facility. For example, a joint commission accredits a facility as a general acute care hospital.

AccountId.description: Healthcare facility (Account) that this accreditation is associated with.

AccreditationRating.description: Rating system used by the accrediting body.

AccreditingBody.description: The organization that provided the accreditation.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this accreditation is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this accreditation is no longer effective.

HealthcareFacilityId.description: The healthcare facility associated with the accreditation.

LastFullSurveyDate.description: Date of the last full survey completed by accrediting body.

LastOnsiteSurveyDate.description: Date that accrediting body was last onsite.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the accreditation.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PractitionerId.description: Practitioner that this accreditation is associated with.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the record was sourced.

Status.description: Accreditation status.

actionplantemplate.name: actionplantemplate
actionplantemplate.description: Defines a template for different assessment tasks in a visit.

ActionPlanType.description: Specifies the type of action plan you’re creating.

Description.description: The description for your action plan template.

IsAdHocItemCreationEnabled.description: Indicates whether ad-hoc creation of tasks is possible.

LastReferencedDate.description: The time stamp for the last time this record was referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The time stamp for the last time this record was viewed.

Name.description: The name for your action plan template

OwnerId.description: Reference to the owner of the record.

TargetEntityType.description: Indicates which entity this template is being created for.

UniqueName.description: The unique name for your action plan template.

ActionPlanTemplateAssignment.name: ActionPlanTemplateAssignment
ActionPlanTemplateAssignment.description: Represents the association of an action plan template with its related care plan template, goal, or problem definition. When instantiated, the action plan generates the corresponding intervention tasks and links them to the appropriate record, such as a condition, goal, or care plan.

ActionPlanTemplateVersionId.description: Action plan template that’s mapped to a problem defintion, goal definition, or care plan template. This field is a relationship field.

AssociatedObjectId.description: The object to which the action plan template is associated. For example: a problem definition, goal definition, or care plan template, associated with an action plan template.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the action plan template assignment record.

ActionPlanTemplateItem.name: ActionPlanTemplateItem
ActionPlanTemplateItem.description: Represents the instance of an item on an action plan template version.

ActionPlanTemplateVersionId.description: The version of the action plan template this item is for.

DisplayOrder.description: The order in which this item is displayed within the action plan template version.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the task created from this template item is active. The default value is false.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether this action plan template item is locked or not. The default value is false.

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether the task created from this template item is required. The default value is false.

ItemEntityType.description: The type of action plan template item entity..

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether this action plan template item can be edited or not. The default value is false.

Name.description: The unique identifier for this action plan template item record.

UniqueName.description: The unique name for this action plan template item. This field is unique within your organization.

ActionVisibility.name: ActionVisibility
ActionVisibility.description: This object serves as a junction to connect Account or Contact to other objects so that information in those other object can be used to define visibility rules for actions in the Dynamic Actions for Unified Health Scoring component.

AccountId.description: The account record of the subject.

ContactId.description: The contact record of the subject.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record.

Address.name: Address
Address.description: Represents a mailing, billing, or home address.

AddressType.description: Picklist of address types. The values are: Mailing Shipping Billing Home

Description.description: A brief description of the address.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the address’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Latitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

LocationType.description: Picklist of location types. The available values are: Warehouse (default) Site Van Plant

Longitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

Name.description: Name of the address.

ParentId.description: A lookup field to the parent location.

AdvTherapyFieldOptOverride.name: AdvTherapyFieldOptOverride
AdvTherapyFieldOptOverride.description: Represents a list of fields with changed optionality, based on certain parameters.

CountryId.description: The country for which the override is applicable.

FieldList.description: The list of fields with optionality that's overruled based on the priority of the conditions.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the field optionality override record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the field optionality override record.

ServiceTerritoryId.description: The service territory condition for which the override is applicable.

TaskName.description: The task condition for which the override is applicable.

WorkProcedureId.description: The work procedure condition for which the override is applicable.

WorkTypeId.description: The work type condition for which the override is applicable.

WorkTypeStepId.description: The work type step condition for which the override is applicable.

AgeBandHlthRskAdjFctr.name: AgeBandHlthRskAdjFctr
AgeBandHlthRskAdjFctr.description: Stores the risk adjustment factor for patients and members based on the age band that they’re a part of and the status of their benefits eligibility.

AgeBandEnd.description: The upper limit of the age band.

AgeBandStart.description: The lower limit of the age band.

CmnyFullBnftDualDisabled.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has full benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

CmnyPartialBenefitDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has partial benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CmnyPartialBnftDualDsbl.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has partial benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

Community.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home.

CommunityFullBnftDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has full benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CommunityNonDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, is covered only by Medicare, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CommunityNonDualDisabled.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, is covered only by Medicare, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

EnrolleeType.description: Specifies whether the patient is a new enrollee or a continued enrollee.

Gender.description: Specifies the gender of the patient.

Institutional.description: Specifies the risk adjustment. factor for a patient who lives at a healthcare facility.

IsActive.description: Indicates that the risk adjustment factors specified in the record are active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The last date and time that the record was referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The last date and time that the record was referenced.

Name.description: The system-generated name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record in the system.

PublishedYear.description: The year when the risk adjustment factors in the record were published.

ApplicationCase.name: ApplicationCase
ApplicationCase.description: This junction object stores a relationship between Case and IndividualApplication.

ApplicationId.description: The individual application associated with a case application.

CaseId.description: The case associated with a case application.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name associated with the record.

AppealIdentifier.description: The identifier of an appeal that has a status change.

AppealStatus.description: Specifies the status of an appeal.

ApplicationFormIdentifier.description: The identifier of the application associated with an appeal.

EventCreationDateTime.description: The date and time when the event was created.

AsmtQstnRespRecommendation.name: AsmtQstnRespRecommendation
AsmtQstnRespRecommendation.description: Maps an assessment question’s response to the recommendation it has to provide for a care plan. Recommendations can be problems, goals, interventions, or other assessments.

AssessmentQuestionVersionId.description: The assessment question whose response is mapped to a recommendation.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record

OmniProcessId.description: The assessment that this question-response-recommendation mapping is valid for. If a response to a question is mapped to the same recommendation, regardless of what assessment it’s a part of, then leave this field blank.

RecommendationReferenceId.description: The problem, goal, interventions, or assessment that a response to a question is mapped to.

TextResponse.description: The response to a question that a recommendation is mapped to.

AssessmentEnvelope.name: AssessmentEnvelope
AssessmentEnvelope.description: Represents information about an envelope that contains the assessments related to a user. For example, you can create an envelope that contains assessments for a patient or a caregiver related to depression or anxiety.

AccountId.description: The recipient of the assessment envelope, such as a patient.

ContactId.description: The recipient of the assessment envelope, such as a caregiver.

ExpirationDateTime.description: The date and time of assessment envelope expiration.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the assessment envelope.

NotificationStatus.description: The sent status of the assessment envelope

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

RequestReferenceId.description: The reference to the context of the assessment envelope request.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the envelope that contains the assessments

AssessmentEnvelopeItem.name: AssessmentEnvelopeItem
AssessmentEnvelopeItem.description: Represents information about an item in an envelope that contains the assessments related to a user. For example, you can create an item that contains an assessment for depression or anxiety.

AssessmentEnvelopeId.description: The assessment envelope that is associated with the item.

AssessmentId.description: The identifier for the assessment envelope item.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Tne name of the assessment envelope item.

AssessmentTask.name: AssessmentTask
AssessmentTask.description: Perform activities such as patient registration or order authorization to capture information.

AssignedToId.description: Represents the user that's assigned the task. This field is a polymorphic relationship field.

EndTime.description: The date and time when the assessment task is completed.

IsRequired.description: Indicate whether a task must be completed to complete a visit. The default value is False.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

ParentId.description: The visit associated with an assessment task. This field is a relationship field.

ReferenceRecordId.description: Represents the record with which the associated task is related. This field is a polymorphic relationship field.

AssetType.description: Represents a type of asset, such as a type of item, physical space, or service offering.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

ParentId.description: The parent asset type associated with the record. Use a parent record to define a relationship between an asset type and an asset subtype.
