Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record.

PatientId.description: The patient that’s part of the episode of care.

ResponsibleOrganizationId.description: The organization that’s responsible for managing the patient’s care during the episode of care.

SourceSystem.description: The source system from where the record was brought into Salesforce.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The identifier of the record in its source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date and time when the record was last modified in its source system.

StartDateTime.description: The date and time when the episode of care started.

Status.description: The status of the eipsode of care.

Type.description: The type od te episode of care.

CareEpisodeDetail.name: CareEpisodeDetail
CareEpisodeDetail.description: Represents additional information associated with a CareEpisode record.

CareEpisodeId.description: The parent care episode that the detail is associated to.

DetailRecordId.description: The detail record that associates additional information to the parent care episode.

DetailType.description: Specifies the type of detail represented in the record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The name of the record owner.

Rank.description: When the detail type is a diagnosis, specifies the rank of the recorded diagnosis in the set of diagnoses that’s part of the episode of care.

RoleCodeId.description: When the detail type is a diagnosis, specifies the role of the recorded diagnoses in the episode of care. This value is a system-defined code.

CareFacilityBed.name: CareFacilityBed
CareFacilityBed.description: Represents information related to different bed types at a facility with associated care programs and products. This object is available in API version 58.0 and later.

AvailableBedCapacity.description: Represents the available bed capacity of an associated service at a facility.

BedTypeCodeId.description: Represents the type of bed associated with a facility.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the care facility bed.

OwnerId.description: ID of the record owner.

ReferenceRecordId.description: Represents the reference record of the object that is associated with a bed in a facility.

TotalBedCapacity.description: Represents the total bed capacity of an associated service at a facility.

CareFeeScheduleItem.name: CareFeeScheduleItem
CareFeeScheduleItem.description: Stores procedure level fees for a fee schedule definition.

CareFeeScheduleItemKey.description: A unique key assigned to the Care Fee Schedule Item record.

FacilityPrice.description: The fees when the procedure is performed in a facility location such as a hospital or Ambulatory Surgical Center (ASC).

FeeScheduleDefinitionId.description: The Fee Schedule Definition associated with the Care Fee Schedule Item.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the Care Fee Schedule Item.

NonFacilityPrice.description: The fees when the procedure is performed in a non-facility location such as the physician's office.

ProcedureCodeDescription.description: The description of the procedure code.

ProcedureCodeId.description: The industry standard code for the procedure such as CPT or HCPCS.

CareGap.name: CareGap
CareGap.description: Represents gaps in patient care through a specified period. This object is available in API version 59.0 and later.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the care gap.

CareBarrierId.description: The care barrier associated with the care gap.

ClinicalMeasureId.description: The clinical measure asscoiated with the care gap.

Description.description: The description of the care gap.

HealthConditionId.description: The health condition associated with the care gap.

LastEvaluatedDate.description: The date and time when the care gap was last evaluated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

MeasureEvaluationStatus.description: Specifies the status of the measure evaluation.

Name.description: The name of the care gap.

OwnerId.description: ID of the record owner.

ProblemDefinitionId.description: The problem definiton associated with the care gap.

RecordOriginType.description: Specifies the method used for retrieving or creating the care gap record.

ReportingPeriodEndDate.description: The end date of the care gap reporting period.

ReportingPeriodStartDate.description: The start date of the care gap reporting period.

SourceSystem.description: The name of external source system from which the record was imported.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of the record in the external source system.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the care gap.

StatusReason.description: The reason for force closing the care gap.

TargetResolutionDate.description: The target resolution date of a care gap for a patient.

CareGapCriteriaResult.name: CareGapCriteriaResult
CareGapCriteriaResult.description: Represents the result of an evaluated clinical measure criteria. This object is available in API version 59.0 and later.

CareGapId.description: The associated care gap that is being evaluated.

ClinicalMeasureCriteriaId.description: The associated measure criteria that the care gap is evaluated against.

EvaluatedCriteriaResult.description: The result of the evaluated criteria.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the care gap criteria result.

CareInterventionType.name: CareInterventionType
CareInterventionType.description: Represents the standard, defined list of interventions maintained by an organization.

Code.description: Medical vocabulary code for the intervention.

CodeType.description: Medical vocabulary code type for the intervention.

Description.description: Description of the intervention.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this intervention type is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the intervention type.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ProcedureCodeSetId.description: The procedure code set associated with the care intervention type.

CareMetricTarget.name: CareMetricTarget
CareMetricTarget.description: Represents the expected care metrics at an org level and patient level.

CodeId.description: The CodeSet ID related to the care metric target.

DetailRatioDenominator.description: The lower value of the care metric target detail ratio.

DetailRatioNumerator.description: The higher value of the care metric target detail ratio.

DetailRatioUnitId.description: The unit of measurement for the care metric target detail ratio.

DueDuration.description: The time it takes to reach the care metric target.

DueDurationUnitId.description: The unit of measurement for the time it takes to reach the care metric target.

EndDate.description: The date when the care metric target value ceases to take effect.

IsOutcomePositive.description: Indicates the expected boolean value. The default value is false.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LowerLimit.description: The lower limit for the care metric target range. Used when Type is set to RANGE.

MeasureCodeId.description: The ID of the related measure code.

Name.description: The name of this care metric target.

NumericValue.description: The numeric value of the care metric target (6 decimal places). Used when Type is set to MIN, MAX, or EXACT.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PatientId.description: The account ID of the patient for whom the care metric target is applicable.

StartDate.description: The date when the care metric target value takes effect.

TargetedOutcome.description: Specifies if the targeted outcome value is false (negative outcome is desired) or true (positive outcome is desired).

UnitOfMeasureId.description: The ID of the unit of measure for the care metric target.

UpperLimit.description: The upper limit for the care metric target range. Used when Type is set to RANGE.

CareObservation.name: CareObservation
CareObservation.description: Represents the observed values for care metrics originating from external systems that contain biometric data

AdditionalCode1Id.description: The system-defined code that represents the type of the observation. This field is meant to be used if the CodeId field isn’t sufficient.

AdditionalCode2Id.description: The system-defined code that represents the type of the observation. This field is meant to be used if the CodeId and AdditionalCode1Id fields aren’t sufficient.

BasedOnId.description: The medication request or service request that the observation is based on.

BaselineUnitId.description: The unit of measure for the baseline values of this observation.

BaselineValueText.description: The baseline value of an observation represented as a string.

BodySiteId.description: The system-defined code that represents the site of the observation on the patient’s body.

CaseId.description: The case associated with the patient's care observation.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the observation.

CodeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the specific observation type.

DerivationSourceId.description: Represents the document or observation from which the value of the observation is derived. If the observation value is derived from a document, reference the diagnostic summary record that represents the document. If the observation value is derived from another observation, reference the CareObservation record representing that observation.

DeviceId.description: The ID of the device generating the observed value.

EffectiveDateTime.description: The date and time when the observation was recorded or the start date and time of the observation’s clinically relevant period.

EncounterId.description: The encounter related to the observation.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the observation’s clinically relevant period.

ExpectedValueId.description: The CodeSet ID related to the care metric target.

HasMetExpectedValue.description: Indicates whether the observed value aligns with the expected value or range.

IsMonitoredRemotely.description: Indicates whether the observed value is obtained via remote monitoring. This record can only be used in processing and charting if this field is set to True. The default value Is false.

IsObserved.description: Indicates the boolean value for the observation. The value is true if something is observed, and false if it’s not. The default value is false. This field is a duplicate field introduced in API version 51.0 that stores the same information as IsOutcomePositive. Use only one of these two fields for this type of information.

IsOutcomePositive.description: Indicates the boolean value for the observation. The value is true if something is observed, and false if it’s not. The IsObserved field is a duplicate of this field that stores the same information. Use only one of these two fields for this type of information. The default value is false.

IssuedDateTime.description: The date and time the current version of the observation record is issued.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LowerBaselineValue.description: Represents the lower limit of the baseline value range for the observation.

MethodId.description: The system-defined code that represents the method of the observation.

Name.description: The name of this care observation.

NumericValue.description: The numeric value of the care observation (6 decimal places).

ObservationEndTime.description: The date and time when the observation ended.

ObservationStartTime.description: The date and time when the observation started.

ObservationStatus.description: Specifies the status of the observation

ObservedSubjectId.description: The account ID of the subject being observed. For example, the ID of the patient being observed.

ObservedValueCodeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the observed value.

ObservedValueDenominator.description: The denominator of the observed value.

ObservedValueNumerator.description: The numerator of the observed value.

ObservedValueText.description: The observed value in text form.

ObservedValueType.description: Specifies the type of observed values recorded in ObservedValueNumerator and ObservedValueDenominator.

ObservedValueUnitId.description: The unit of measure for the observed value. This is a duplicate field introduced in API version 51.0 that stores the same information as UnitOfMeasureId. Use only one of these fields to store this information.

ObserverId.description: The person who made the observation.

OwnerId.description: ID of the record owner. Available in API version 56.0 and later.

PartOfId.description: The medication statement, procedure, or immunization that this observation is a part of.

ProcessingResult.description: The processing result of this observation record. Applicable only if IsMonitoredRemotely is set to True

SourceSystem.description: The source system from where the record was brought into Salesforce.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The identifier of the record in its source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date and time when the record was last modified in its source system.

UnitOfMeasureId.description: The unit of measure for the observed value. The ObservedValueUnitId field is a duplicate of this field that stores the same information. Use only one of these fields to store this information.

UpperBaselineValue.description: Represents the upper limit of the baseline value range for the observation.

ValueInterpretation.description: Specifies the interpretation of values observed.

CarePgmEnrolleeWkOrdStep.name: CarePgmEnrolleeWkOrdStep
CarePgmEnrolleeWkOrdStep.description: Represents information about the step in a work order that's executed for the care program enrollee.

ActionPlanTemplateId.description: Represents the action plan template containing the tasks related to each work order step.

AreAllTasksCompleted.description: Determine whether all the child tasks for the step are completed (true) or not (false).

EndDateTime.description: Represents the end date and time for the execution of the work order step.

IsCustodyCompleted.description: Determine whether all the custody chain entries for the step and the related tasks are completed (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: Represents the name of the step associated with the care program enrollee work order record.

ParentEnrolleeWorkOrderId.description: Represents the parent work order of the care program enrollee that's associated with the step.

SequenceNumber.description: Represents the sequence in which the work order step will be executed.

StartDateTime.description: Represents the start date and time for the execution of the work order step.

Status.description: Specifies the execution status of the work order step.

WorkTypeStepId.description: The work type step for which the work order step of the care program enrollee is created.

CarePgmEnrolleeWorkOrder.name: CarePgmEnrolleeWorkOrder
CarePgmEnrolleeWorkOrder.description: Represents information about the work order that's executed for the care program enrollee.

CareProgramEnrolleeId.description: This field represents the care program enrollee for whom the work order record is created.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time for the execution of the care program enrollee work order.

IsCustodyCompleted.description: Indicates whether all the custody chain entries for the work order are completed (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the work order record.

NextWorkOrderId.description: This field represents next work order that's executed for the associated care program enrollee.

PreviousWorkOrderId.description: The previous work order that's executed for the associated care program enrollee.

ServiceAppointmentId.description: This field represents the service appointment that's associated with the work type.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time for the execution of the care program enrollee work order.

Status.description: This field specifies the execution status of the care program enrollee work order.

WorkTypeId.description: This field represents work type for which the work order of the care program enrollee is created.

CarePgmProvHealthcareProvider.name: CarePgmProvHealthcareProvider
CarePgmProvHealthcareProvider.description: Represents a junction object identifying the primary healthcare professional associated with a care program provider and to look up all healthcare professionals for care program providers.

CareProgramProviderId.description: The ID of the care program provider that is associated with the healthcare provider (healthcare professional).

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from when this association record is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date when this association record is no longer effective.

HealthcareProviderId.description: The ID of the healthcare provider (healthcare professional) that is associated with the care program provider.

IsPrimaryProvider.description: Indicates that the healthcare provider (healthcare professional) is the primary provider for the care program provider.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name for this association between a care program provider and a healthcare provider (healthcare professional).

SourceSystem.description: The system from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of the system from which the record was sourced.

CarePlan.name: CarePlan
CarePlan.description: Stores information about a care plan associated with a medication therapy review. Care plans are used to assign tasks to patients as part of medication therapy reviews.

CarePlanTemplateId.description: The care plan template associated with the care plan.

CaseId.description: The case associated with the care plan.

Description.description: A description of the care plan.

EndDate.description: The date until when the care plan is effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

MedicationTherapyReviewId.description: The medication therapy review that's associated with this care plan.

Name.description: The unique name of the care plan.

ParticipantId.description: The account associated with the care plan.

StartDate.description: The date from when the care plan is effective.

Status.description: The status of the care plan.

TaskJobStatus.description: The job status of tasks associated with the care plan. This field is currently not used.

TaskJobStatusMessage.description: The job status message of tasks associated with the care plan. This field is currently not used.

CarePlanActivity.name: CarePlanActivity
CarePlanActivity.description: Represents a planned action that’s part of a care plan. For example, knowledge campaigns, physiotherapy appointments, medication regimens, etc.

ActivityCodeId.description: The system-defined code that represents an activity.

ActivityTimingId.description: The schedule prescribed for the activity. You can use use an ActivityTiming record to specifiy how long and how often the activy has to be repeated.

ActivityType.description: Specifies the type of the activity.

AdministeredProductCodeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the product that’s administered as part of the activity.

AdministeredProductId.description: Specifies the product in that’s administered as part of the activity.

CarePlanId.description: The parent care plan that the activity is a part of.

DailyDoseQuantity.description: The quantity of product that’s administered or consumed each day as part of the activity.

DailyDoseUnitId.description: The unit of the values specified in DailyDoseQuantity.

Description.description: The description of the activity.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

LocationId.description: The place where the activity is intended to happen. This could be provider facility, the patient’s home, etc.

Name.description: The auto-generated name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record. Available in API version 57.0.

ProhibitedActivity.description: Indicates whether the activity described in the record is prescribed as something that the patient should avoid doing. Use the Default value if you’d rather not specify this as true or false.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The activity that’s prescribed as part of the care plan.

ScheduleDescription.description: The schedule for when the activty is intended to be performed.

ScheduledPeriodEndDateTime.description: The date and time when the activity’s prescribed time period ends.

ScheduledPeriodStartDateTime.description: The date and time when the activity’s prescribed time period starts.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the activity.

StatusReasonCodeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the reason for why the value specified in Status is valid.

SuppliedQuantity.description: The total quantity of product that’s supplied, administered, or consumed as part of the activity during the course of the care plan.

SuppliedQuantityUnitId.description: The unit of the value specified in SuppliedQuantity.

CarePlanActivityDetail.name: CarePlanActivityDetail
CarePlanActivityDetail.description: Represents additional information associated with a CarePlanActivity record.

CarePlanActivityId.description: The parent care plan activity record that the additional information is associated to.

DetailCodeId.description: Represents the system-defined code that represents the additional information associated to the care plan activity record. This information can be an outcome of the activity or one of the reasons the activity was required. Use this field with the Outcome Code and Reason Code detail types.

DetailRecordId.description: The clinical record that represents the additional information associated to the parent care plan activity record. This information can an outcome of the activity, a performer involved in the activity, or the reason why the activity was necessary.

DetailType.description: Specifies the type of additional information associated with the parent care plan activity.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record.

CarePlanDetail.name: CarePlanDetail
CarePlanDetail.description: Represents additional information associated with a care plan record.

CarePlanId.description: References the parent care plan record.

DetailCodeId.description: The system-defined code that represents additional information associated to a care plan. Detail code is used to support the Category detail type.

DetailRecordId.description: The reference record that represents additional information associated to the parent care plan.

DetailType.description: Specifies the type of additional information associated to the parent record. For instance, the care plan that the parent care plan is based on, part of, or replaces, and so on.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record.

ProblemPriority.description: For the Addressed Item detail type, indicates the priority of the addressed problem.

SequenceNumber.description: For the Addressed Item detail type, indicates position of the addressed problem in the list of all addressed problem.

TaskJobStatus.description: Possible values are: Completed Failed InProgress - In Progress Submitted

TaskJobStatusMessage.description: Status message for the task job.

CarePlanTemplate.name: CarePlanTemplate
CarePlanTemplate.description: Stores information about care plan template that’s used to define to-do lists for patients during medication therapy reviews.

Description.description: A description of the care plan template.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the care plan template.

OwnerId.description: ID of the record owner.

Status.description: The status of the care plan template.

CarePlanTemplateGoal.name: CarePlanTemplateGoal
CarePlanTemplateGoal.description: Represents goals in Care Plan Templates that don’t have problems as their parents. These goals are added directly under the care plan in the template .

CarePlanTemplateId.description: References the parent care plan template that the goal is a part of.

GoalDefinitionId.description: References a goal definition in the PGI library that specifies the details of the templatized goal.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the templatized care plan goal.

Priority.description: The priority of the templatized goal.

CarePlanTemplateProblem.name: CarePlanTemplateProblem
CarePlanTemplateProblem.description: Represents problems in Care Plan Templates. These problems may or may not have goals as their direct children.

CarePlanTemplateId.description: The parent care plan template record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record.

Priority.description: Specifies the priority of the templatized problem.

ProblemDefinitionId.description: References the problem definition in the PGI library that contains the clinical information related to the templatized problem. If the templatized problem has a goal as its direct child, then reference a ProblemGoalDefinition record instead.

SequenceNumber.description: Determines the spot of the templatized problem in the list of all templatized problems in the care plan template.

SourceSystem.description: The source system from which the care plan template problem was brought into Salesforce.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The identifier of the care plan template problem in its source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date and time when the care plan template problem was last modified in its source system.

CarePreauth.name: CarePreauth
CarePreauth.description: Represents the details of preauthorizations for care under a member’s plan.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this preauthorization is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date after which this preauthorization is no longer effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MemberPlanId.description: The ID of the member plan for which this preauthorization is being provided.

Name.description: The name of this preauthorization.

PayerId.description: The ID of the payer covering the cost of this treatment.

PreauthIdentifier.description: An identifier provided by the insurance company for preauthorization of a service.

ReferringPhysician.description: The name of the doctor who referred the member for this treatment.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the system this preauthorization record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this preauthorization record on its source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date on which this preauthorization was last changed on its source system.

Status.description: The status of this preauthorization record. The default the picklist values are: Active Inactive

CarePreauthItem.name: CarePreauthItem
CarePreauthItem.description: Represents the details of items included in a preauthorization for care under a member’s plan.

CarePreauthId.description: The ID of the care preauthorization this item details.

EndingServiceCode.description: The ending service code for the category of care being provided.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Laterality.description: The side of the body receiving care.

Name.description: Name of this preauthorized care item.

Notes.description: Notes about this preauthorized care item.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PreauthitemSequence.description: Sequence of this item among the preauthorized care items.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the system this preauthorization record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this preauthorization record on its source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date on which this preauthorization was last changed on its source system.

StartingServiceCode.description: The starting service code for the category of care being provided.

Unit.description: Units by which the preauthorized quantity is measured.

CareProcessingError.name: CareProcessingError
CareProcessingError.description: Stores information on processing errors sent from payer to provider on a member’s authorization request.

ActionCodeId.description: The code that's associated with the resolution of the error that occurred when processing an authorization request.

Description.description: The description of the error.

ErrorCodeId.description: The code that's associated with the error that occurred when processing an authorization request.

LastModifiedById.description: The ID of the user who last updated the record.

LastModifiedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user updated the record.

Name.description: The name of the care processing error.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ReferenceObjectId.description: The object that's associated with the error.

CareProgram.name: CareProgram
CareProgram.description: Represents a set of activities, such as a patient therapy, financial assistance, education, wellness, or fitness plan, offered to participants by an employer or insurer.

ActiveSiteCount.description: The number of active sites for conducting the research study. This field is available in API version 64.0 and later when Site Management is enabled.

BudgetAmount.description: Approved budget for the care program.

CareProgramName.description: The name of the care program.

Category.description: Represents the category of the care program.

CurrentEnrolleeCount.description: The number of enrollees who have joined the care program to date. This field is available for the Participant Management feature in API version 61.0 and later.

Description.description: A short description explaining the program.

EnrollmentDurationMeasureId.description: The unit of measure for the participant enrollment duration. This field is available in API version 64.0 and later when Site Management is enabled.

EnrollmentRate.description: The rate of the participant enrollment at the site. This is calculated by dividing the target enrollment count by the target enrollment duration and the number of planned sites. This field is available in API version 64.0 and later when Site Management is enabled.

FirstSiteClosedOutDate.description: The date on which the first site is closed out.

FirstSiteActivatedDate.description: The date on which the first site is activated for conducting research studies. This field is available in API version 64.0 and later when Site Management is enabled.

LastSiteActivatedDate.description: The date on which the last site is activated for conducting research studies. This field is available in API version 64.0 and later when Site Management is enabled.

LastSiteClosedOutDate.description: The date on which the last site is closed out. This field is available in API version 64.0 and later when Site Management is enabled.

ParentProgram.description: Name of another program that this program is a part of, if any.

ProgramSponsor.description: Name of the third-party program sponsor, if any.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the record was sourced.

StartDate.description: Effective start date of the program.

Status.description: Status of the program.

TargetEnrollmentDuration.description: The duration in which the enrollment for the targeted number of participants must be completed. This field is available in API version 64.0 and later when Site Management is enabled.

TargetEnrolleeCount.description: The target enrollee count of the care program. This field is available for the Participant Management feature in API version 61.0 and later.

TargetSiteCount.description: The number of sites planned for conducting the research study. This field is available in API version 64.0 and later when Site Management is enabled.

CareProgramAssistance.name: CareProgramAssistance
CareProgramAssistance.description: Represents a junction between Care Program and Program objects.

CareProgramId.description: The care program associated with the care program assistance.

CareProgramProductId.description: The care program product associated with the care program assistance.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the care program assistance.

ProgramId.description: The program associated with the care program assistance.

CareProgramCampaign.name: CareProgramCampaign
CareProgramCampaign.description: Represents a relationship between the Care Program object and the Campaign object.

CampaignId.description: The campaign associated to the care program.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: A short name for the care program campaign.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the care program campaign was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the record was sourced.

Status.description: The status of the care program campaign record.

CareProgramEligibilityRule.name: CareProgramEligibilityRule
CareProgramEligibilityRule.description: Represents a rule defining the criteria for patient care program enrollment eligibility. This entity creates an association between Care Program and an Enrollment Eligibility Criteria.

CareProgramId.description: Identifier of a care program. Represents a set of activities, such as therapy, wellness, or a fitness plan, offered to participants by a healthcare provider, life sciences organization, employer, or insurer.

EligibilityCriteriaId.description: Criteria that define patient enrollment eligibility for a care program.

IsInclusionRule.description: Indicates whether the rule is included or excluded when determining care program eligibility. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether the care program eligibility rule is required.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name for the care program eligibility rule.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the record was sourced.

Status.description: Defines whether the eligibility rule is in force or not.

Type.description: Type of the eligibility Rule. This field is available for the Participant Management feature in API version 61.0 and later.

CareProgramEnrollee.name: CareProgramEnrollee
CareProgramEnrollee.description: Represents a participant enrolled in a care program.

AccountId.description: Person Account representing the enrollee

BenefitCoverageType.description: Specifies the coverage status of the enrollee under both Medicare and Medicaid.

ClinicalServiceRequestId.description: The clinical service request associated with the care program enrollee.

CurrentWorkOrderId.description: The work order that's currently being executed for the care program enrollee.

CurrentWorkOrderStepId.description: The work order step that's currently being executed for the care program enrollee.

EnrolledAtId.description: The site, location, or territory where the enrollee enrolled in the care program. This field is available in API version 64.0 when Site Management is enabled.

EnrolleeType.description: Specifies whether the enrollee is a new enrollee or a continued enrollee.

EnrollmentLocationId.description: The service territory where an advanced therapy care program is executed.

FlowInterviewId.description: Runtime instance of the associated flow.

FlowOrchestrationInstanceId.description: Runtime instance of the associated flow orchestration.

IsPatientInLtrmCareFacility.description: Indicates that the patient was at a long-term healthcare facility during outreach or enrollment to the care program. This field is available for the Medication Management feature in API version 56.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the enrollee.

OptOutPeriodEndDateTime.description: The date on which the patient’s opt-out from the care program ends. This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

OptOutPeriodStartDateTime.description: The date that the patient opted out of the care program. This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

OptOutReasonType.description: The reason why the patient opted out of the care program. This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

ResearchStudyCandidateId.description: The related Research Study Candidate record of the care program enrollee.

OwnerId.description: The UserId for the record owner. This field is a polymorphic relationship field.This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the enrollee record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the enrollee record was sourced.

Status.description: Status of the enrollee.

CareProgramEnrolleeProduct.name: CareProgramEnrolleeProduct
CareProgramEnrolleeProduct.description: Represents the affiliation between a care program enrollee and a care program product, a care program provider, or both.

CareProgramEnrolleeId.description: The care program enrollee associated with this care program product or care program provider.

CareProgramProductId.description: The care program product associated with this care program enrollee and care program provider.

CareProgramProviderId.description: The care program provider associated with this care program enrollee and care program product.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the product the enrollee participates in.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ProgramId.description: The program that offers financial assistance for this product.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the record was sourced.

Status.description: The status of the care program product or service related to the care program provider and the recipient of the product or service.

CareProgramEnrollmentCard.name: CareProgramEnrollmentCard
CareProgramEnrollmentCard.description: Represents a care program membership card that includes a membership number or enrollment code.

CardNumber.description: The unique card number for a care program. Often a membership number or enrollment code on a physical card assigned to the care program enrollee.

CareProgramEnrolleeId.description: The care program enrollee with whom this care program card is associated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name for the care program enrollment card.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the record was sourced.

Status.description: The status of a card in relation to a care program enrollee.

CareProgramGoal.name: CareProgramGoal
CareProgramGoal.description: Represents a business or clinical goal related to a care program.

CareProgramId.description: The care program associated with a corresponding goal.

CompletionDate.description: The completion date of a care program goal.

Description.description: A detailed description of the care program goal.

DueDate.description: The due date for a care program goal.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the care program goal.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Priority.description: The priority of the care program goal.

ProgressPercentage.description: The percentage completion of the care program goal.

SequenceNumber.description: The order or sequence of the care program goal relative to other care program goals.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the record was sourced.

StartDate.description: The start date for a care program goal.

Status.description: The status of a care program goal.

Type.description: The type of the care program goal.

CareProgramProduct.name: CareProgramProduct
CareProgramProduct.description: Represents the affiliation between a care program and a care program product, care program provider, or both.

Availability.description: The default availability of the product to an enrollee in the context of a care program. For example, some products or services are available to all enrollees, others are limited to special circumstances, and others are no longer available.

CareProgramId.description: Identifier for the care program associated with a care program product.

CareProgramPrice.description: A standard list price for a given product in the context of a care program.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the care program product.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ProductId.description: Identifier of the product associated with a care program

SourceSystem.description: System from which the care program product was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the care program product was sourced.

Status.description: The status of the product in the context of a care program.

CareProgramProvider.name: CareProgramProvider
CareProgramProvider.description: Represents a business account that is the service provider for a care program product.

AccountId.description: The account/business entity that is providing the care program product/service to a care program enrollee.

CareProgramContactId.description: The primary person a patient can contact about the care program.

CareProgramProductId.description: The care program product to which this care program provider is associated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the provider associated with the care program.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Role.description: The type of organization delivering the services included in the program.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the record was sourced.

Status.description: The status of a care program provider in relation to a care program product.

CareProgramTeamMember.name: CareProgramTeamMember
CareProgramTeamMember.description: Represents a person who delivers services under a program, such as a program manager or care coordinator.

AccountId.description: Person account representing the team member.

Category.description: Specifies the category that the member belongs to. This field is available for the Participant Management feature in API version 61.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MemberId.description: The team member associated with the care program team member. This field is available for the Participant Management feature in API version 61.0 and later.

Name.description: Name of the care program team member.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the record was sourced.

CareProviderAdverseAction.name: CareProviderAdverseAction
CareProviderAdverseAction.description: Captures adverse actions against the provider, such as malpractice lawsuits or revoked licences.

AccountId.description: The account this adverse action is associated with.

AccreditationId.description: The accreditation that might be affected by this adverse action.

ActionIssueDate.description: The date when the adverse action was issued by the regulatory authority.

ActionType.description: The type of adverse action that is being taken.

BoardCertificationId.description: The board certification that might be affected by this adverse action

BusinessLicenseId.description: The business license that might be affected by this adverse action.

CaseNumber.description: The case number associated with this adverse action.

CourtSentence.description: The final sentence by the governing court, if any.

Description.description: Summary of the adverse action.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this Adverse Action is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this Adverse Action is no longer effective.

HealthcareProviderId.description: HealthcareProvider that this Adverse Action is associated with

IncidentDate.description: The date when the incident took place that resulted in the adverse action.

IncidentReportedDate.description: The date on which the incident was reported to the regulatory authority.

InsurancePolicyNumber.description: The number of the insurance policy associated with an adverse action.

InsuranceProviderName.description: The name of the insurance provider that issued the policy associated with an adverse action.

Jurisdiction.description: The name of the court or goverment body that issued the legal determination.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the adverse action that is being taken.

PenaltyAmount.description: The penalty amount imposed for an adverse action.

OwnerId.description: Time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed this record.

PractitionerId.description: The practitioner this adverse action record is associated with.

RegulatoryBody.description: The name of the regulatory authority to which the incident was reported.

RegulatoryBodyType.description: Specifies the type of regulatory authority to which the incident was reported.

ReportingEntity.description: The name of the entity or organization that reported this action.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: Unique record ID in source system.

Status.description: The status of the license or certification, such as "revoked" or "suspended."

CareProviderFacilitySpecialty.name: CareProviderFacilitySpecialty
CareProviderFacilitySpecialty.description: Represents all the specialties that the practitioner provides at a given location. For example, a physician who is board-certified in both spine and neuro may provide spine services at one location and neuro services at another.

AccountId.description: Facility associated with this provider facility specialty record.

ActiveResearchStudyCount.description: The count of active research studies being performed by the care provider for the specialty. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later when Site Management (Pilot) is enabled.

CompletedResearchStudyCount.description: The count of research studies completed by the care provider for the specialty. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later when Site Management (Pilot) is enabled.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this record is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this record is no longer effective.

HealthcareFacilityId.description: The ID of the healthcare facility associated with the specialty. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later when Site Management (Pilot) is enabled.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record is active.

IsPrimarySpecialty.description: Indicates whether this specialty is the practitioner's primary specialty at this facility, or the facility's primary specialty.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the specialty provided at this provider facility.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PractitionerFacilityId.description: Practitioner facility associated with this provider facility specialty record.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the record was sourced.

SpecialtyId.description: Identifies the specialty associated with this provider facility specialty record

SpecialtyRole.description: Role of the specialty for the provider or practitioner.

CareProviderSearchableField.name: CareProviderSearchableField
CareProviderSearchableField.description: This object holds denormalized data from certain fields in the Provider Relationship Management data model.

CertificationType.description: Specified in BoardCertification.CertificationType. Note BoardCertification.HealthcareProvider must also be specified.

Condition.description: The conditions represented by the problem definitions that the healthcare provider offers treatment for.

EducationLevel.description: Specified in PersonEducation.EducationLevel. Not applicable for a facility. Note Degree, Status, DegreeEarner, and HealthCareProvider must also be specified.

FacilityId.description: Represents the facility with which the practitioner is associated. Use for practitioner records only. If the provider is a facility, set this field value to null.

FacilityPhone.description: Facility's main contact phone number. Specified in Account.Phone.

IsAcceptingNewPatients.description: Indicates whether the practitioner is accepting new patients. Specified in HealthcareFacilityNetwork.PanelStatus, where PanelStatus = Open indicates Accepting New Patients = true. The default value is false. Note This field applies only to practitioners, not facilities.

IsUpdateNeeded.description: Indicates whether a change to data in a healthcare provider record or a related record requires a data sync (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

LanguagesSpoken.description: The languages spoken by the person. Specified in PersonLanguage.Language.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LicenseJurisdictionCountry.description: The country where the license of the Healthcare Provider is registered. Specified in BusinessLicense.JurisdictionCountry.

LicenseJurisdictionRegion.description: The region where the license of the Healthcare Provider is registered. Specified in BusinessLicense.JurisdictionRegion.

LicenseJurisdictionState.description: The state where the license of the Healthcare Provider is registered. Specified in BusinessLicense.JurisdictionState.

LicenseName.description: The name of the license associated with the Healthcare Provider. Specified in BusinessLicense.Name.

LicenseStatus.description: Specifies the status of the license given to the Healthcare Provider. Specified in BusinessLicense.Status.

NationalProviderIdentifier.description: Provider’s unique NPI number. Specified in HealthcareProviderNpi.Account for a facility, and HealthcareProviderNpi.Practitioner for a practitioner.

OperatingHoursId.description: Identifies a set of operating hours for this practitioner at this facility. Specified in Account.OperatingHoursId for a facility, or in HeathcarePractitionerFacility.OperatingHoursId for a practitioner-facility combination.

PhotoUrl.description: The URL for a photograph of the practitioner. Field is synced based on Account-PhotoUrl or Contact.PhotoUrl.

PlanType.description: The type of plan, with the following default options: PPO HMO Medicare Medicaid Workers Comp Specified in HealthcareFacilityNetwork.Account for a facility, or HealthcareFacilityNetwork.PractitionerFacility for a practitioner-facility combination. Note HealthcareFacilityNetwork.Name and PayerNetwork.Name must also be populated.

ProviderGender.description: The gender of the HealthcareProvider. Specified in Contact.Gender or Account.PersonGender.

ProviderId.description: Lookup to HealthcareProvider. Represents a facility or practitioner-facility combination.

ProviderName.description: Name of the provider. Specified in Account for a facility, or in Contact for a practitioner.

ProviderType.description: Type of provider or facility. For example, a pharmacist or an ambulatory care facility. Specified in HealthCareProvider.ProviderType.

Service.description: The list of services that the healthcare provider offers.

ServiceCode.description: The list of codes associated with the service that the healthcare provider offers.

Specialty.description: Specialty associated with the provider. Specified in CareSpecialty.SpecialtyType. For a facility, the Specialty is sourced from a Care Provider Facility Specialty record, which connects a facility (CareProviderFacilitySpecialty.AccountId) to a care specialty (CareProviderFacilitySpecialty.SpecialtyId). For a practitioner, the Specialty is sourced from a Care Provider Facility Specialty record, which connects a Healthcare Practitioner Facility record (CareProviderFacilitySpecialty.PractitionerFacilityId) to a care specialty (CareProviderFacilitySpecialty.SpecialtyId). The Healthcare Practitioner Facility record then connects the facility (HealthcarePractitionerFacility.AccountId) to a practitioner (HealthcarePractitionerFacility.PractitionerId). All source records must be active.

SubSpecialty.description: Provider's subspecialty. Specified in HealthcareProviderTaxonomy.TaxonomyType. Not valid for a practitioner-facility combination. Note Taxonomy.TaxonomyType must also be specified.

SyncLogRecord.description: The provider search sync log record that shows the data sync status of a healthcare provider record.

CareProviderSearchConfig.name: CareProviderSearchConfig
CareProviderSearchConfig.description: Represents fields that can appear in provider search results.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the object in the API. This name can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters, and must be unique in your org.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this configuration is active.

Language.description: The language that the care provider search uses.

MasterLabel.description: The label for the care provider.

SourceField.description: The API name of the field that is copied to the target object.

TargetField.description: The API name of the field to copy the data to.

CareRegisteredDevice.name: CareRegisteredDevice
CareRegisteredDevice.description: Represents a device or device registration information for a patient or a care program enrollee.

CareProgramEnrolleeId.description: The ID of the care program enrollee to whom this device is registered.

DeviceId.description: The asset ID for the device.

DeviceTypeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the type of the device.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of this device registration record.

PatientId.description: The account ID of the patient to whom this device is registered.

RegistrationDate.description: The date and time when this device was registered.

SafetyInformation.description: The health and safety information about with the device.

SourceSystem.description: The system from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of the system from which the record was sourced.

Status.description: Indicates whether the device registration is active.

SupportContactDetail.description: Contact details of the person or organization that provides support for the device.

UniqueDeviceId1.description: Unique device identifier (UDI) assigned to device label or package. It identifies the labeler and the specific version or model of a device. A device may have multiple UDIs since it could have been sold in multiple jurisdictions.

UniqueDeviceId1Issuer.description: The organization that issued the UDI1 for the device.

UniqueDeviceId2.description: Unique device identifier (UDI) assigned to device label or package. It identifies the labeler and the specific version or model of a device. A device may have multiple UDIs since it could have been sold in multiple jurisdictions.

UniqueDeviceId2Issuer.description: The organization that issued the UDI2 for the device.

UniqueDeviceId3.description: Unique device identifier (UDI) assigned to device label or package. It identifies the labeler and the specific version or model of a device. A device may have multiple UDIs since it could have been sold in multiple jurisdictions.

UniqueDeviceId3Issuer.description: The organization that issued the UDI3 for the device.

CareRequest.name: CareRequest
CareRequest.description: Represents the general details of a care-related request including member information, admission date, decision reason, and so on. A single request can contain multiple diagnoses, services, or drugs. Care requests include preauthorizations for drugs and services, admission notifications, concurrent review of admissions, appeals, complaints, and grievances.

AcknowledgementLetterSentDate.description: Date and time when an acknowledgment letter was sent to the requester.

ActualAdmissionDate.description: Actual admission date for the patient.

ActualDischargeDate.description: Actual discharge date for the patient.

AdmissionSource.description: Where the patient was admitted from, for example, a clinic or an emergency room.

AdmissionType.description: Type of admission, for example, emergency or elective.

AorReceivedDate.description: Date and time when the Appointment of Representative (AOR) form was received.

AorRequestedDate.description: Date and time when the AOR form was requested.

AppealRequestReasonType.description: The type of reason associated with the appeal request.

AppointedRepresentativeId.description: ID of the appointed representative for the member.

AppointedRepVerbalContactDate.description: Date and time of verbal contact with the member's appointed representative.

AppointedRepWrittenContactDate.description: Date and time correspondence was sent to the member's appointed representative.

ApprovedLengthOfStay.description: Approved number of days for the admission.

ApprovedLevelOfCare.description: Approved level of care for the patient, for example, Hospital-Observaton or SNF-Rehabilitation.

CareRequestCaseId.description: Case related to the care request. Note A case record can only be related to a single care request record. Therefore, ensure that the Case record you specify in this field isn’t already associated with another care request.

ClaimNumber.description: Claim number for the medical service or medication, if one exists.

ClinicalCaseType.description: Clinical case type for the patient, for example, High Risk Fall or Adult Diabetes.

CriteriaMet.description: Indicates whether criteria for care was met.

CumulativeLengthOfStay.description: Total number of days for the admission.

CurrentLevelOfCare.description: Level of care that the patient is receiving.

DecisionDate.description: Date by which the decision must be made for the request.

DecisionDaysRemaining.description: Number of days remaining for a decision or resolution.

DecisionLetter.description: The text of the determination letter sent to the member and provider.

DecisionReasonDescription.description: Text describing the reason for the decision.

DeniedLengthOfStay.description: Number of days denied for the admission.

DeniedLevelOfCare.description: Level of care denied for the patient.

DispositionNotes.description: Notes related to the disposition of the request.

DueDate.description: Date the request is due for completion.

EffectiveFrom.description: The start date for an effective-date range.

EffectiveTo.description: The end date for an effective-date range.

ExtensionRequestReceivedDate.description: Date and time an extension was requested.

FacilityRecordNumber.description: The medical record number used to identify a patient.

FacilityRoomBedType.description: Type of facility bed for the patient.

FacilityRoomNumber.description: The facility room number for the patient.

FinalLevelOfCare.description: Final level of care the patient.

FirstReviewerId.description: The name of the person who reviewed the request.

FirstReviewerNotes.description: Notes from the first reviewer related to the case.

GeneralPractitionerId.description: Member's primary or general care practitioner.

GeneralPractitionerVerbalNotifiedDate.description: Date when the primary care practitioner was verbally notified of the decision

GeneralPractitionerWrittenNotifiedDate.description: Date when the primary care practitioner was notified of the decision by written correspondence.

InfoReceivedDate.description: Date and time when additional information was received from the provider or member.

InfoRequestedDate.description: Date and time when additional information was requested from the provider or member.

InitialDenialNotificationTime.description: The time when the initial care request was denied.

IsExtendedRequest.description: Indicates whether a request was extended.

IsReadmission.description: Indicates whether the care request is for a readmission.

IsServiceOrMedicationReceived.description: Indicates whether the member has already received the medial service or medication.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MedicalDirectorId.description: Name of the medical director who reviewed the request.

MedicalDirectorNotes.description: Notes from the medical director related to the request.

MemberCondition.description: Free-form description of the member's condition.

MemberContactDateTime.description: Date and time when the member was contacted.

MemberDateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the member.

MemberGroupNumber.description: Insurance group number for the member.

MemberIdentificationNumber.description: Insurance identification number for the member.

MemberPrimaryPlanId.description: The primary insurance plan of a member associated with the care request when the member is insured under multiple plans.

MemberPrognosis.description: Indicator of the provider's prognosis for the member.

MemberSecondaryPlanId.description: The secondary insurance plan of a member associated with the care request when the member is insured under multiple plans.

MemberStatus.description: The member's status at admission, date of outpatient service, or start of care.

MemberVerbalNotificationDate.description: Date when the member was verbally notified of the decision.

MemberWrittenNotificationDate.description: Date when the member was notified of the decision by written correspondence.

ModifiedLengthOfStay.description: Modified number of days for the admission.

ModifiedLevelOfCare.description: Modified level of care for the patient.

Name.description: Name of the care request.

NextReviewDate.description: Date the next review is scheduled for completion.

OriginalDenialMedicalDirectorId.description: The name of the medical director who denied the original request.

ParProvider.description: Indicator of whether this provider has entered into an agreement with the insurance carrier.

PlaceOfService.description: Place of service for the member's care such as an inpatient hospital or an ambulatory surgery center.

PractitionerContactDateTime.description: Date and time when the provider was contacted.

QuantityType.description: Quantity type for the request such as days, units, or visits.

ReconsiderationDenialNotificationDate.description: The date when the reconsidered care request was denied.

ReconsiderationDenialNotificationTime.description: The time when the reconsidered care request was denied.

ReferenceCareRequestCaseId.description: The reference care request case number associated with the care request.

ReferenceCaseNumber.description: Reference authorization number for an appeal, complaint, or grievance.

ReopenReasonDescription.description: Description of why the request was reopened.

RequestedDate.description: Date the request was originally requested.

RequestedLengthOfStay.description: Requested number of days for the admission.

RequestedLevelOfCare.description: Requested level of care for the patient.

RequesterType.description: Indicates the role of the individual initiating the request.

RequestingPractitionerId.description: Ordering or referring practitioner for the request.

RequestingPractitionerSpecialty.description: Specialty of the practitioner, for example, Family Practice or General Surgery.

RequestingPractitionerVerbalNotifiedDate.description: Date when the practitioner was verbally notified of the decision.

RequestingPractitionerWrittenNotifiedDat.description: Date when the practitioner was notified of the decision by written correspondence.

ResolutionDate.description: Date when the complaint, appeal, or grievance was resolved.

ResolutionLetterSentDate.description: Date and time when a resolution letter was sent to the requester.

RootCauseNotes.description: Field for notes related to the root cause for the request.

ScheduledAdmissionDate.description: Anticipated admission date for the patient.

ScheduledDischargeDate.description: Scheduled discharge date for the patient.

ServiceDate.description: Date when patient received the service.

ServicingFacilityId.description: Facility where the service is being provided.

SourceSystem.description: System from which this request was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the request was sourced.

SourceSystemModified.description: Timestamp of the most recent update from the source system.

CareRequestDrug.name: CareRequestDrug
CareRequestDrug.description: Represents the details of a requested drug including name, strength, frequency, and instructions for administration. One or more drug requests can be associated with a care request.

AssertionIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the coverage assertion.

AuthApprovalIdentifier.description: The unique identifier assigned to the drug on approval of the authorization request.

In Developer Edition orgs, NamespacePrefix is set to the namespace prefix of the org for all objects that support it, unless an object is in an installed managed package. In that case, the object has the namespace prefix of the installed managed package. This field’s value is the namespace prefix of the Developer Edition org of the package developer. In orgs that are not Developer Edition orgs, NamespacePrefix is set only for objects that are part of an installed managed package. All other objects have no namespace prefix.

ClinicalMeasure.name: ClinicalMeasure
ClinicalMeasure.description: Represents a structured and computable definition of a health-related measure for identifying care gaps. This object is available in API version 59.0 and later.

ApplicationName.description: The application used for calculating the measure.

Author.description: The individual or organization that primarily authored the measure.

ClinicalRcmdSummary.description: A summary of relevant clinical guidelines or other clinical recommendations supporting the measure.

ClinicalUsage.description: The description of how the measure is used.

CompositeScoringType.description: The scoring method used to combine the component measures to determine the composite score.

CopyrightLabel.description: The copyright label of a measure.

CopyrightStatement.description: A copyright statement of the measure and/or its contents.

Description.description: The description of the measure.

Disclaimer.description: A disclaimer for the use of the measure or its referenced content.

Editor.description: The individual or organization responsible for editing the measure.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The end date of a measure evaluation period.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The start date of a measure evaluation period.

Endorser.description: The individual or organization responsible for endorsing the measure.

IntendedJurisdictionCodeId.description: The legal or geographic region where the measure is intended to be used.

IsExperimental.description: Indicates whether a measure was authored for experimental purposes (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastReviewedDate.description: The date the measure was last reviewed.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

MeasureCategory.description: Specifies the high-level category that the measure belongs to, such as Assessment or Treatment.

MeasureType.description: Specifies the measure type based on what the measure calculates.

Name.description: A human-friendly name for a measure.

OwnerId.description: ID of the record owner.

PopulationBasisTypeCodeId.description: Specifies the population basis type for a measure when the basis is different from the subject.

ProblemDefinitionId.description: The problem definition associated with the measure.

PublisherApprovalDate.description: The date the measure was approved by the publisher.

PublisherContact.description: The contact details of the publisher.

PublisherName.description: The individual or organization that publishes and maintains the measure.

Purpose.description: A short explanation of why a measure is needed.

Rationale.description: A detailed reason for why the measure exists, inlcuding its objective and impact.

RelatedResources.description: Supplementary resources or materials supporting a measure, such as additional documentation and citations.

Reviewer.description: The individual or organization responsible for reviewing the measure.

RiskAdjustmentMethod.description: A description of the adjustment method for risks, such as clinical severity and conditions present at the start of care that may influence measure scores.

ScoreAggregationMethod.description: A description of the method used to combine the different measure scores of each population into one aggregated result.

ScoreImprovementIndication.description: Specifies whether an increase or decrease in score is the preferred result for a measure.

ScoringType.description: The scoring type used for calculating the measure.

ScoringUnitId.description: Specifes the expected unit of measure for the measure score when the unit can't be inferred from the measure logic.

SourceSystem.description: The external system of record.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of the record in the source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date and time when the record was last modified in the source system.

Subtitle.description: A subtitle for a measure, adding additonal context.

SupportedContext.description: The context that the measure is intended to support.

SystemReadableName.description: A computer-friendly name for a measure.

TermCodeId.description: Specifies description of an individual term used within the measure.

VersionNumber.description: The version of a measure that is managed by the author.

ClinicalMeasureCriteria.description: Represents a computable criteria of a health-related measure. This object is available in API version 59.0 and later.

CriteriaType.description: Specifies the type of criteria that the measure checks for.

Name.description: The name of the clinical measure criteria.

OwnerId.description: ID of the record owner.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The reference record of the object that is associated with the criteria.

ClinicalMeasureCriteriaGrp.name: ClinicalMeasureCriteriaGrp
ClinicalMeasureCriteriaGrp.description: Represents a group of computable criteria for a health-related measure. This object is available in API version 59.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

PopulationBasisTypeCodeId.description: Specifies the population basis type for a measure the criteria group belongs to, when the basis is different from the subject.

ScoreAggregationMethod.description: A description of the method used to combine the different measure scores of each population into one aggregated result.
