CondIntrctnHlthRskAdjFctr.name: CondIntrctnHlthRskAdjFctr
CondIntrctnHlthRskAdjFctr.description: Stores the risk adjustment factor for patients and members based on the set of interacting conditions they are diagnosed with and the status of their benefits eligibility.

CmnyFullBnftDualDisabled.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has full benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

CmnyPartialBenefitDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has partial benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CmnyPartialBnftDualDsbl.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has partial benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

Community.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home.

CommunityFullBnftDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has full benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CommunityNonDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, is covered only by Medicare, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CommunityNonDualDisabled.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, is covered only by Medicare, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

ConditionCodeList.description: Specifies the first set of condition codes for the condition interactions that the risk adjustment factors are defined for.

Institutional.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at a healthcare facility.

InteractingCondCodeList.description: Specifies the codes of the interacting conditions for the condition interactions that the risk adjustment factors are defined for.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the specified condition interactions and risk adjustment factor combinations are currently active.

IsDisabled.description: Indicates whether the interaction is with a condition or a disability.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The system-generated name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record in the system.

PublishedYear.description: The year when the risk adjust factors were published.

When this amount is reached, the plan starts to contribute towards treatment. It includes deductibles, copayments, and coinsurance, but excludes premiums.

When this amount is reached, the plan starts to contribute towards treatment. It includes deductibles, copayments, and coinsurance, but excludes premiums.

DocumentChecklistItem.name: DocumentChecklistItem
DocumentChecklistItem.description: Represents a checklist item for a documentation file upload.

DocumentTypeId.description: ID of the document type for the document checklist item.

IsAccepted.description: Indicates whether the file has been accepted. The default value is False.

IsFrozen.description: Indicates that the item can no longer be modified. The default value is False.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

properties.description: Person that the uploaded documentation pertains to.

EndDateTime.description: The date and time when the engagement with the attendee ends.

EngagementId.description: Required. The engagement interaction, messaging session, or voice call that’s related to the attendee.

ExternalAttendeeId.description: The external user related to the engagement, such as the customer or partner. To avoid an error, either this field or the InternalAttendeeId field must have a value.

InternalAttendeeId.description: The internal user related to the engagement, such as the call center agent. To avoid an error, either this field or the ExternalAttendeeId field must have a value.

IsAuthenticated.description: Indicates whether the initiating attendee of the engagement interaction was authenticated through interactive voice response (IVR) or Web channel (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

IsVerified.description: Indicates whether the initiating attendee of the engagement interaction was verified (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

OwnerId.description: The Salesforce ID of the person who owns this engagement attendee record.

Role.description: The role of an engagement attendee. This field is available in API version 56.0 and later. Possible values are: OnBehalf Self

StartDateTime.description: Required. The date and time when the engagement with the attendee starts.

VerificationTime.description: The time when the attendee was verified for the engagement interaction. This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

AttendeeVerificationTime.description: The time when the attendee was verified for the engagement interaction. You can manually set this time. If isAttendeeVerified is set to true, then if you don’t manually set this time, it’s set based on the current system date and time.

CommunicationChannel.description: Required. The communication channel through which engagement interaction occurs.

ContextId.description: The ID of the record that’s considered as the context for the engagement interaction. For example, when a customer initiates an engagement interaction by booking a service appointment for an inquiry, the service appointment is the context for that engagement interaction.

Duration.description: Read-only. The duration of the engagement interaction based on the start date time and end date time. The duration is calculated when the end time is updated.

EndDateTime.description: The date and time when the engagement interaction ends.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The unique external identifier of the engagement interaction.

InitiatingAttendeeId.description: The attendee who initiated the engagement interaction.

IsAttendeeAuthenticated.description: Indicates whether the initiating attendee of the engagement interaction has been authenticated through IVR or Web channel (true) or not (false).

IsAttendeeVerified.description: Indicates whether the initiating attendee of the engagement interaction has been verified (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MappedState.description: Specifies the state of the engagement interaction that changes when the status of the interaction gets updated.

Name.description: The name of the Engagement Interaction record.

OwnerId.description: The Salesforce ID of the person who owns this engagement interaction record.

PhoneNumber.description: The phone number of the caller to get the context about the previous engagement interaction. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

Reason.description: The reason for the engagement as stated by the customer or their representative during the engagement interaction. This field is available from API version 56.0 and later.

Sentiment.description: The analyzed sentiment of the engagement interaction attendee about the engagement interaction.

StartDateTime.description: Required. The date and time when the engagement interaction starts.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the engagement interaction, which also impacts the interaction state.

Type.description: Specifies the type of interaction that was initiated by the attendee.

EngagementId.description: The engagement interaction, messaging session, or voice call record that’s related to the topic discussed during the engagement.

InteractionSummary.description: The summary of the engagement interaction. This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

OwnerId.description: The Salesforce ID of the person who owns this engagement topic record.

ParentTopicId.description: The parent engagement topic record that’s associated with this engagement topic.

ProcessName.description: The name of the process executed during the engagement interaction.

ProcessStatus.description: Specifies the current status of the process that’s executed during the engagement interaction.

ProcessType.description: The type of the process executed during the engagement interaction.

RelatedPersonId.description: The person for whom the engagement interaction has been initiated.

TopicId.description: The engagement topic record that’s associated with the parent engagement topic.

GoalAssignment.name: GoalAssignment
GoalAssignment.description: Represents the goals that are part of a care plan.

CompletionDate.description: The date when the goal is completed.

GoalType.description: Specifies the type of the goal.

IsContinuousGoal.description: Indicates whether the goal is a continuous goal (true) or not (false). For instance, setting a goal to quit smoking.

GoalAssignmentDetail.description: Represents additional information associated with a GoalAssignment record.

GoalDefinition.description: Represents a goal or a business objective that’s used as a reference. When instantiated, GoalDefinition records create GoalAssignment records that serve as goals in care plans.

HealthCareDiagnosis.name: HealthCareDiagnosis
HealthCareDiagnosis.description: Represents information related to industry-standard healthcare diagnosis codes. Before the Spring ’21 release, the Healthcare Procedure and Healthcare Diagnosis objects stored codes specifically related to procedures and diagnoses. These codes were used for prior-authorization requests and approval processes. Since the Spring’21 release, Health Cloud uses the Code Set and Code Set Bundle objects for this purpose instead.

Category.description: Indicates the category for this diagnosis such as newborn, pediatric, maternity, or adult.

CodeType.description: Type of diagnosis code represented in the record such as ICD-9 or ICD-10.

Gender.description: Indicates whether this diagnosis is for males, females, or all genders.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the diagnosis code is available for use.

IsComplicationOrComorbidity.description: Indicates whether this diagnosis is used to represent a complication or comorbidity.

IsHospitalAcquiredCondition.description: Indicates whether this diagnosis represents a condition acquired while in the hospital.

IsMajorComplicationOrComorbidity.description: Indicates whether this diagnosis is used to represent a major complication or comorbidity.

IsPresentOnAdmissionExempt.description: Indicates whether diagnosis code is exempt from the diagnosis present on admission requirement.

IsPrimaryDiagnosis.description: Indicates whether diagnosis code can be used as primary diagnosis only, or can be used in any diagnosis sequence.

IsUnacceptablePrincipalDxIpAdmit.description: Indicates whether diagnosis code is an unacceptable principal diagnosis for inpatient admission per Medicare Code Edits.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the code that displays in search and lookup fields. Salesforce recommends using the code along with the description to populate this field. For example, use <Code>: <Description> or <Code>-<Description> such as (E08.37X9 - Diabetes mellitus due to underlying condition).

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

HealthCareProcedure.name: HealthCareProcedure
HealthCareProcedure.description: Represents information related to industry-standard healthcare procedure codes. Before the Spring ’21 release, the Healthcare Procedure and Healthcare Diagnosis objects stored codes specifically related to procedures and diagnoses. These codes were used for prior-authorization requests and approval processes. Since the Spring’21 release, Health Cloud uses the Code Set and Code Set Bundle objects for this purpose instead.

Category.description: Category of the procedure code such as anesthesia, surgery, radiology, and so on.

Code.description: Industry standard procedure code such as CPT or HCPCS.

CodeShortDescription.description: Short description of the procedure code.

CodeType.description: Type of procedure code represented in the record such as CPT or HCPCS.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the diagnosis code is available for use.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

EffectiveTo.description: Specifies the date from which the provider is no longer effective.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

PreviousScore.description: The previous score of the subject for the specified category. This field is automatically updated when with the previous value of the CurrentScore field when the score is updated.

PreviousScoreDate.description: The date when the previous score was calculated. This field is automatically updated with the previous value of the CurrentScoreDate field when the score is updated.

ScoreCategoryId.description: The score category that the score belongs to.

ScoreChangePercent.description: The degree of change between the current score and the previous score.

ScoredAccountId.description: The account that is the subject of the score.

ScoredContactId.description: The contact that is the subject of the score.

ScoredLeadId.description: The lead that is the subject of the score.

HealthScoreActionLog.name: HealthScoreActionLog
HealthScoreActionLog.description: Represents the log of actions triggered from the Dynamic Actions for Unified Health Scoring component in the Unified Health Scoring feature.

ActionDate.description: The date and time when the action was triggered by an end user.

ActionDescription.description: The description of the triggered action, as defined by the admin.

ActionIconUrl.description: The URL of triggered action’s icon, as defined by the admin.

ActionLabel.description: The label of the triggered action, as defined by the admin.

ActionName.description: The API name of the triggered action, as defined by the admin.

ActionStatus.description: The status of the triggered action. The default value is ‘triggered’. To update the status to another value, set up a custom trigger or process.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the log record.

PerformedById.description: The user who triggered the action.

Score.description: The score of the subject who the action was triggered for. This field isn’t populated in logs by default. Customize the action logging capability of Unified Health Scoring to use this field.

ScoreCategoryId.description: The score category of a score of the subject who the action was triggered for. This field isn’t populated in logs by default. Customize the action logging capability of Unified Health Scoring to use this field.

SubjectId.description: The subject who the action was triggered for.

TargetAccountId.description: If the subject is an account, the account record of the subject.

TargetContactId.description: If the subject is an contact, the contact record of the subject.

TargetLeadId.description: If the subject is an lead, the lead record of the subject.

HierCondHlthCodeMapping.name: HierCondHlthCodeMapping
HierCondHlthCodeMapping.description: Represents how Hierarchical Condition Category (HCC) codes map to condition codes for a specific year.

ConditionCodeId.description: The health condition code that’s mapped to a Hierarchical Condition Category (HCC) code.

EffectiveEndYear.description: The year till when the mapping is valid.

EffectiveStartYear.description: The year from when the mapping is valid.

HierarchicalCondCategoryCodeId.description: The HCC code that a health condition code is mapped to.

IsActive.description: Indicates that the specified health condition and HCC code mapping is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The system-generated name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record in the system.

PublishedYear.description: The year when the specified mapping was published.

HierCondHlthRskAdjFctr.name: HierCondHlthRskAdjFctr
HierCondHlthRskAdjFctr.description: Stores the risk adjustment factor for patients and members based on the set of Hierarchical Condition Category (HCC) codes that apply to them and the status of their benefits eligibility.

CmnyFullBnftDualDisabled.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has full benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

CmnyPartialBenefitDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has partial benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CmnyPartialBnftDualDsbl.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has partial benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

Community.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home.

CommunityFullBnftDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has full benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CommunityNonDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, is covered only by Medicare, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CommunityNonDualDisabled.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, is covered only by Medicare, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

Condition.description: Specifies the condition for which the HCC code is defined.

ConditionCategory.description: Specifies the broader category that the specified condition belongs to. For instance, Respiratory Ailment.

HierCondCategoryCodeId.description: The record ID of the HCC code.

Institutional.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at a healthcare facility.

IsActive.description: Indicates that the risk adjustment factors defined in the record are active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The system-generated name of the record.

OverriddenCodes.description: The list of HCC codes overridden by the specified HCC code.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record in the system.

PublishedYear.description: The year when the specified risk adjustment factors were published.

HlthCareProvTreatedCondition.name: HlthCareProvTreatedCondition
HlthCareProvTreatedCondition.description: Represents a junction object between a healthcare provider, facility, or practitioner and a problem definition that's related to a health condition, such as disease or illness.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date when the provider began treating the condition.

EffectiveTo.description: The date when the provider stopped treating the condition.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the provider is actively treating the condition (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of this association between a healthcare provider, facility, or practitioner, and a problem definition that's related to a health condition.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

IndicatorAssignment.name: IndicatorAssignment
IndicatorAssignment.description: Represents the assignment of an indicator definition that's used to measure the performance of an outcome or a related activity.

IndicatorAssignmentType.description: Specifies the object that the indicator assignment measures.

IndicatorDefinitionId.description: The indicator definition that's associated with the indicator assignment.

IndicatorImprvGuideline.description: The guidelines to improve the indicator score.

IntendedDirection.description: Specifies the intended direction of change in the behavior, knowledge, skills, status, or level of functioning that's detailed in the parent indicator definition.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the indicator assignment.

OutcomeId.description: The outcome that the indicator assignment measures.

OwnerId.description: The owner of this indicator assignment.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the indicator assignment.

IndicatorDefinition.name: IndicatorDefinition
IndicatorDefinition.description: Represents information about the indicator assignment and the process of measuring and calculating the indicator results.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns the outcome.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the indicator definition.

UnitOfMeasureId.description: The unit of measure for the target, baseline, and result values that are associated with this indicator definition.

IndicatorPerformancePeriod.name: IndicatorPerformancePeriod
IndicatorPerformancePeriod.description: Represents information about a specified time period including the frequency at which indicator results should be calculated and the baseline value of the indicator.

BaselineDescription.description: The description of the baseline value.

BaselineValue.description: The value of the indicator assignment at the beginning of the indicator performance period.

Description.description: The description of the indicator performance period.

IndicatorAssignmentId.description: The indicator assignment that’s associated with the indicator performance period.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastResultMeasurementDate.description: The date when the last result value was measured.

LastResultValue.description: The result value from the most recently measured indicator result.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view.

Name.description: The name of the indicator performance period.

TargetProgress.description: Specifies the progress of the target within the time period.

TargetValue.description: The target value of the indicator assignment within the time period.

TimePeriodId.description: The time period that is associated with the indicator performance period.

IndicatorResult.name: IndicatorResult
IndicatorResult.description: Represents the result of an indicator assignment for the specified time period that can be used to track the performance of the indicator.

CalculationMethod.description: Determines whether the indicator result was added manually or calculated by automation. This field is available from API version 60.0 and later.

Denominator.description: The denominator in automatically-calculated results that are an average or percent. This field is available from API version 60.0 and later.

Description.description: The description of the indicator result.

FlowDefinitionApiName.description: The API name of the flow definition associated with this indicator result. This field is available from API version 60.0 and later.

FlowVersion.description: The version of the flow that calculated this result. This field is available from API version 60.0 and later.

IndicatorPerformancePeriodId.description: The indicator performance period for which the result is defined.

LastReferencedDate.description: Date and time when a user last referenced this indicator result.

LastViewedDate.description: Date and time when a user last viewed this indicator result.

MeasurementDate.description: The date on which the indicator result is measured.

Name.description: The name of the indicator result.

Numerator.description: The numerator in automatically-calculated results that are an average or percent. This field is available from API version 60.0 and later.

ResultValue.description: The result for the indicator performance period.

IndividualApplication.name: IndividualApplication
IndividualApplication.description: Represents an application form submitted by an individual.

AccountId.description: The ID of the applicant’s account.

AmountPaid.description: The amount paid by the applicant.

ApplicationCaseId.description: The ID of a case that relates to this application.

ApplicationCategory.description: Categorizes the ways an application can be processed. Possible values are: Basic Special

ApplicationType.description: The type of the application. Possible values are: New Renewal

AppliedDate.description: The date on which the application was received from the applicant.

ApprovedDate.description: The date on which the application was approved.

BusinessTypeId.description: The type of individual business activity for this application.

Category.description: The service category of the application.

Description.description: Text description provided by the applicant.

IsOwnerEditable.description: Whether the owner ID of this record can be changed.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when a user most recently viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

InsurancePolicy.name: InsurancePolicy
InsurancePolicy.description: Represents a type of insurance policy. Available with the Provider Network Management permission set license.

AttributesSelectedValues__c.description: Values of root product attributes set at the InsurancePolicy level.

AuditTerm.description: The frequency of the audit. For example, monthly, semi-monthly, quarterly, semi-annually, or annually.

CancellationDate.description: The date on which the insurance policy was canceled.

CancellationReason.description: The reason for canceling the insurance policy.

CancellationReasonType.description: The category that the cancellation reason belongs to.

CashSurrenderValue.description: The cash surrender value of the insurance policy.

ContractLineItemId__c.description: The ID of a line item in the contract for the policy.

DateRenewed.description: The date on which the policy was last renewed.

Discount.description: The discount that was given on the policy.

EffectiveDate.description: The date from which the policy is in effect.

ExpirationDate.description: The date on which the policy expires.

FinalRenewalDate.description: The final date on which the policyholder can renew the insurance policy.

GrossWrittenPremium.description: The total expected premium amount for the insurance policy over the policy period.

NameInsuredId.description: The name of the primary insured.

OriginalEffectiveDate.description: The date on which the original policy went into effect. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

OriginalExpirationDate.description: Expiration date of the original policy. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

PaidToDate.description: The date up to which the policy is paid for. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

PaymentDueDate.description: The date on which the next payment of the premium is due.

PlanTier.description: The class that the insurance policy belongs to. For example, silver, gold, or platinum.

PlanType.description: The type of the insurance policy plan. For example, single life, joint last-to-die, or joint first-to-die (primarily applicable for term insurance).

PolicyDescription.description: The description of the insurance policy.

PolicyName.description: The name of the insurance policy.

PolicyTerm.description: The time period for which the policy provides coverage. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

PolicyType.description: The type of the insurance policy. For example, home, auto, annuity, or life.

PremiumAmount.description: The premium paid by the policy owner for the current billing period.

PremiumCalculationMethod.description: The premium calculation method for a payment period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

PremiumFrequency.description: The frequency of the premium payment or billing. For example, monthly, semi-monthly, quarterly, semi-annually, or annually.

PremiumPaymentType.description: The type of premium payment, such as Advance or Arrears. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

PreviousPremium.description: The premium of the policy before it was renewed.

PreviousRenewalDate.description: The date on which the insurance policy was renewed in the last renewal cycle.

PriorPolicyId.description: The ID of the insurance policy before it was renewed.

ProducerId.description: The ID of the agency or the agent who sold the policy.

ProductCode__c.description: The code of the product that this policy belongs to.

ProductId.description: The product that this policy belongs to. For example, if the customer buys a silver auto policy, this field looks up to the silver auto product in the Product object.

RenewalChannel.description: The channel through which the insurance policy was renewed.

RenewalDate.description: The date on which the policy is expected to be renewed. The actual renewal date may be different.

SaleDate.description: The date on which the policy was sold.

ServicingOffice.description: The address of the office that issued the policy and that services the policy.

SourceOpportunityId.description: The ID of the opportunity from which the policy was created.

SourceQuoteId.description: The ID of the quote from which the policy was created.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique ID of this record in the source system.

StandardFeeAmount.description: The expected fee for the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

StandardPremiumAmount.description: The expected premium for the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

StandardTaxAmount.description: The expected tax on the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

Status.description: The status of the insurance policy.

Substatus.description: The carrier system's substatus code for the insurance policy.

TaxesSurcharges.description: The taxes and surcharges levied on the premium for the insurance policy.

TermFeeAmount.description: The expected fee for the policy over the policy period, prorated based on the policy's effective dates. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

TermPremiumAmount.description: The expected premium for the policy over the policy period, prorated based on the policy's effective dates. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

TermTaxAmount.description: The expected tax on the policy over the policy period, prorated based on the policy's effective dates. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

TotalCommissionAmount.description: The total commission amount for the policy.

TotalStandardAmount.description: The sum of the expected premium, fee, and tax for the policy over the policy period. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

TotalSumInsured.description: The total insured amount. This field is available from API version 51.0 and later.

UnderwritingEntityId.description: Legal entity that underwrote the insurance policy.

UniversalPolicyNumber.description: A number that uniquely identifies the policy across different source systems.

EmployerLatitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

EmployerLongitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

PgmBasedHlthRskAdjFctr.description: Stores the risk adjustment factor for patients and members based on their eligibility for certain benefits programs. For instance, Medicaid in the US.

CmnyFullBnftDualDisabled.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has full benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

CmnyPartialBenefitDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has partial benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CmnyPartialBnftDualDsbl.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has partial benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

Community.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home.

CommunityFullBnftDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, has full benefits from both Medicare and Medicaid, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CommunityNonDualAged.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, is covered only by Medicare, and is enrolled in Medicare because of their age.

CommunityNonDualDisabled.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at home, is covered only by Medicare, and is enrolled in Medicare because of a disability.

Gender.description: Specifies the gender of the patient.

Institutional.description: Specifies the risk adjustment factor for a patient who lives at a healthcare facility.

IsActive.description: Indicates that the risk adjustment factors defined in the record are active.

IsDisabled.description: Indicates that the patient has a disability.

IsOriginallyDisabled.description: Indicates that patient was originally disabled.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The system-generated name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record in the system.

ProgramType.description: Specifies the type of program that the risk adjustment factors are defined for.

PublishedYear.description: The year when the risk adjustment factors were published.

PlanBenefit.name: PlanBenefit
PlanBenefit.description: Represents the standard benefits available under a plan that the purchaser offers to their members.

BenefitNotes.description: Additional information about the benefits available to members under this plan’s coverage.

CoinsuranceNotes.description: Information about the contribution a member makes towards treatment.

CopayNotes.description: Additional information on the copayment amounts that members contribute.

DeductibleNotes.description: Additional information about a member’s deductibles.

DocumentLocation.description: Hyperlink to internal or external resources.

EffectiveDate.description: The date on which these benefits are communicated to plan members.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date on which these benefits become effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which these benefits ceased to be effective.

EmergencyDepartmentCopay.description: Patient's portion of payment for using emergency department services.

FamilyInNetworkDeductible.description: The amount a member pays for health care provided by the health plan’s preferred providers for all family members. When this amount is reached, the plan starts to contribute towards treatment.

FamilyInNetworkOutofPocket.description: The most a member pays during a coverage year for health care provided by the health plan’s preferred providers for all family members. It includes deductibles, copayments, and coinsurance, but is in addition to premiums.

FamilyOutofNetworkDeductible.description: The amount a member pay for health care provided by non-preferred providers for all family members before this plan starts to contribute towards treatment.

FamilyOutofNetworkOutofPocket.description: The most a member pays during a coverage year for health care provided by non-preferred providers for all family members. It includes deductibles, copayments, and coinsurance, but is in addition to premiums.

IndividualInNetworkDeductible.description: The amount a member pays for health care provided by the health plan’s preferred providers to any one family member. When this amount is reached, the plan starts to contribute towards treatment.

IndividualInNetworkOutofPocket.description: The most a member pays during a coverage year for health care provided by the health plan’s preferred providers for any one family member. It includes deductibles, copayments, and coinsurance, but excludes premiums.

IndividualOutofNetworkDeductible.description: The amount a member pays for health care provided by non-preferred providers to any one family member before this plan starts to contribute towards treatment.

IndividualOutofNetworkOutofPocket.description: The most a member pays during a coverage year for health care provided by non-preferred providers for any one family member. It includes deductibles, copayments, and coinsurance, but excludes premiums.

InNetworkCoinsuranceAmount.description: The amount a member contributes towards each treatment undertaken by the health plan’s preferred providers.

InNetworkCoinsurancePercentage.description: The percentage of treatment cost the member pays for each treatment undertaken by the health plan’s preferred providers.

InNetworkLifetimeMaximum.description: The most a member pays during the lifetime membership on this plan for health care provided by the health plan’s preferred providers. It includes deductibles, copayments, and coinsurance, but excludes premiums.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LifetimeMaximumNotes.description: Additional information about a member’s maximum lifetime payments.

Name.description: Name of these plan coverage benefits.

OutofNetworkCoinsuranceAmount.description: The amount a member contributes towards treatment undertaken by non-preferred providers.

OutofNetworkCoinsurancePercentage.description: The percentage of treatment cost the member pays for treatment undertaken by non-preferred providers.

OutofNetworkLifetimeMaximum.description: The most a member pays during the lifetime membership on this plan for health care provided by non-preferred providers. It includes deductibles, copayments, and coinsurance, but excludes premiums.

OutofPocketNotes.description: Additional information about the out-of-pocket payment a member makes.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PrimaryCareCopay.description: The amount a member contributes towards primary care treatment.

PurchaserPlanId.description: The ID of the purchaser plan offering these benefits.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the system this benefits record came from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this benefits record on its source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date on which these benefits were last changed on their source system.

SpecialistCopay.description: The amount a member contributes towards specialist consultations.

Status.description: The status of these benefits. The default the picklist values are: Active Inactive

UrgentCareCopay.description: The amount a member contributes towards urgent care.

Pricebook2.name: Pricebook2
Pricebook2.description: Represents a price book that contains the list of products that your org sells.

Description.description: Text description of the price book.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the price book is active (true) or not (false). Inactive price books are hidden in many areas in the user interface. You can change this field’s value as often as necessary. Label is Active.

IsArchived.description: Indicates whether the price book has been archived (true) or not (false). This field is read only.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the price book has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.

IsStandard.description: Indicates whether the price book is the standard price book for the org (true) or not (false). Every org has one standard price book—all other price books are custom price books.

Name.description: Required. Name of this object. This field is read-only for the standard price book. Label is Price Book Name.

Pricebookentry.name: Pricebookentry
Pricebookentry.description: Represents a product entry (an association between a price book and product) in a price book.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this price book entry is active.

IsArchived.description: Indicates whether the price book entry has been archived (true) or not (false). This is set to true when the product record it’s associated with is archived, or when the price book record is archived. This field is read only. Available in API version 45.0 and later. Label is Archived.

Name.description: Name of this price book entry record. This read-only field references the value in the Name field of the product record. Label is Product Name.

Pricebook2Id.description: Required. ID of the price book record with which this record is associated. This field must be specified when creating price book records. It can’t be changed in an update.

Product2Id.description: Required. ID of the product record with which this record is associated. This field must be specified when creating product records. It can’t be changed in an update.

ProductCode.description: Product code for this record. This read-only field references the value in the ProductCode field of the associated product record.

UnitPrice.description: Required. Unit price for this price book entry. You can specify a value only if UseStandardPrice is set to false. Label is List Price.

UseStandardPrice.description: Indicates whether this price book entry uses the standard price defined in the standard price book record.

Category.description: The category that the defined problem belongs to.

CodeId.description: The system-defined code that defines the problem.

Description.description: The description for the problem definition.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the problem definition is active or not.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record.

UsageType.description: Indicates the type of problem record instantiated from definition.

Type.description: Specifies the type of problem definition.

ProblemGoalDefinition.name: ProblemGoalDefinition
ProblemGoalDefinition.description: A junction object that associated a goal definition to its parent problem definition. These junction records assist in establishing the problem-goal hierarchy in care plans instantiated from the PGI library.

GoalDefinitionId.description: References the GoalDefinition record that’s associated to a parent ProblemDefinition record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record.

ProblemDefinitionId.description: References the ProblemDefinition record that’s associated to a child GoalDefinition record.

Product2.name: Product2
Product2.description: Represents a product that your org sells.

Description.description: A text description of this record. Label is Product Description.

DisplayUrl.description: URL leading to a specific version of a record in the linked external data source.

ExternalDataSourceId.description: ID of the related external data source.

ExternalId.description: The unique identifier of a record in the linked external data source. For example, ID #123.

Family.description: Name of the product family associated with this record. Product families are configured as picklists in the user interface. Label is Product Family.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this record is active.

IsArchived.description: Indicated whether the product is archived.

IsSerialized.description: Indicates whether the product supports serial numbers. If an associated product item record already exists, this boolean can’t be set to true unless the product item’s quantity is zero.

LastReferencedDate.description: Time stamp for the last time this record was referenced.

Name.description: Required. Default name of this record. Label is Product Name.

ProductCode.description: Default product code for this record. Your org defines the product code naming pattern.

QuantityUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of the product; for example, kilograms, liters, or cases. This field comes with only one value, Each, so you may want to create your own. The QuantityUnitOfMeasure field on ProductItem inherits this field’s values.

StockKeepingUnit.description: The SKU for the product. Use in tandem with or instead of the ProductCode field. For example, you can track the manufacturer’s identifying code in the Product Code field and assign the product a SKU when you resell it.

ProductAvailabilityProjection.name: ProductAvailabilityProjection
ProductAvailabilityProjection.description: Represents the projected product quantity available at an inventory location at various points in time. Records for this object are automatically created by Intelligent Sales.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record.

Product2Id.description: The product whose quantity is available quantity is projected.

ProductLocationId.description: The inventory location of the product with that quantity.

ProjectedQuantity.description: The quantity projected at the inventory for the specified date.

ProjectionDate.description: The date for when the quantity projection is applicable.

Status.description: The status of the inventory based on the projected quantity and the required quantity for that day.

ProductFulfillmentLocation.name: ProductFulfillmentLocation
ProductFulfillmentLocation.description: Associates a business account and a product inventory with the responsible field rep.

AccountId.description: The business account a field rep is responsible for visiting.

FulfillmentLocationId.description: The inventory location from which an order will be fulfilled.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LocationId.description: The location of the account the field rep visits.

Name.description: The name of the Product Fulfillment Location record.

ProductId.description: The name of the product the field rep fulfills at the account.

UserId.description: The field rep responsible for the account and inventory.

ProductItem.name: ProductItem
ProductItem.description: Represents the stock of a particular product at a particular location in field service, such as all bolts stored in your main warehouse.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the product item was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the product item was last viewed.

LocationId.description: Location associated with the product item. This usually indicates where the product item is stored.

OwnerId.description: The product item’s owner.

Product2Id.description: Product associated with the product item, which represents the type of product in your inventory.

ProductItemNumber.description: (Read Only) Auto-generated number identifying the product item.

ProductName.description: A name for the product item. Try to select a name that indicates what is being stored where; for example, Batteries in Warehouse A.

QuantityOnHand.description: The quantity at the location. If you want to add a serial number, this value must be 1.

QuantityUnitOfMeasure.description: Units of the product item; for example, kilograms or liters. Quantity Unit of Measure picklist values are inherited from the Quantity Unit of Measure field on products.

SerialNumber.description: A unique number for identification purposes. If you want to enter a serial number, the Quantity on Hand must be 1.

productrequired.name: productrequired
productrequired.description: Represents a product that is needed to complete a visit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the product required was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the product required was last viewed.

ParentRecordId.description: The work order or work order line item that the product is required for.

ParentRecordType.description: Indicates whether the parent record is a work order or a work order line item.

ProductName.description: The name of the product required.

ProductRequiredNumber.description: (Read only) Auto-generated number identifying the product required.

producttransfer.name: producttransfer
producttransfer.description: Represents the transfer of inventory between locations in field service.

Description.description: Details not recorded in the provided fields.

DestinationLocationId.description: The place the product is to be delivered.

ExpectedPickupDate.description: The date that the transfer is being requested for.

IsReceived.description: Checkbox identifying that the product was received.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the product request was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the product request was last viewed.

OwnerId.description: Owner of the product transfer.

Product2Id.description: Lookup field for the product associated with the product transfer.

ProductTransferNumber.description: An auto-assigned number that identifies the product transfer.

QuantityReceived.description: Amount of product received at the destination location.

QuantitySent.description: Amount of product that’s being requested.

QuantityUnitOfMeasure.description: The units of the product, for example grams, liters, or units.

ReceivedById.description: Lookup field for the person who received the product at the destination location.

ShipmentExpectedDeliveryDate.description: The date for which the transfer is being accepted..

SourceLocationId.description: Reference to the location of the inventory making the transfer.

SourceProductItemId.description: Reference to the inventory making the transfer.

Status.description: The status of the transfer request.

ProgramEnrlEligibilityCrit.name: ProgramEnrlEligibilityCrit
ProgramEnrlEligibilityCrit.description: Represents a junction between Program and Enrollment Eligibility Criteria objects.

EnrollmentEligibilityCritId.description: The enrollment eligibility criteria associated with the program enrollment eligibility criteria.

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether an enrollment eligibility criterion is mandatory (true) or optional (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the program enrollment eligibility criteria.

ProgramId.description: The program associated with the program enrollment eligibility criteria.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the program enrollment eligibility criteria.

Type.description: Specifies the type of enrollment eligibility criteria.

ProgramRecommendationRule.name: ProgramRecommendationRule
ProgramRecommendationRule.description: Represents the eligibility criteria and recommendation for a program.

Country.description: The country where the program is eligible for implementation.

HasActiveCommercialIns.description: Indicates whether this program has an active commercial insurance.

IsInclusionRule.description: Indicates whether it's an inclusion rule (true) or an exclusion rule (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MaximumAge.description: The maximum age for enrolling in the program.

MinimumAge.description: The minimum age for enrolling in the program.

Name.description: The name of the program recommendation rule.

ProgramId.description: The program associated with the program recommendation rule.

ProgramType.description: The type of program associated with the program recommendation rule.

RecommendedProgramPriority.description: The recommended priority of the program.

ProviderNetworkContract.name: ProviderNetworkContract
ProviderNetworkContract.description: Represents a provider and a network bound together by a contract.

ContractId.description: The contract that ties the network and provider together.

EndDate.description: The end date of the contract between the provider and the network.

HealthcarePayerNetworkId.description: The healthcare payer network associated with the contract.

HealthcareProviderId.description: The healthcare provider associated with the contract.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last referenced a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the ProviderNetworkContract record.

StartDate.description: The start date of the contract between the provider and the network.

ProviderNetworkTier.name: ProviderNetworkTier
ProviderNetworkTier.description: Represents unique tiers for each provider network.

Description.description: Represents the description of the provider network tier.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the provider network tier is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last referenced a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Represents the name of the provider network tier.

ProviderNetworkId.description: Represents the parent provider network whose tier is specified by the record.

ProviderSearchSyncLog.name: ProviderSearchSyncLog
ProviderSearchSyncLog.description: Represents a log with information about the provider search data sync status of a healthcare provider record.

FacilityId.description: The business account of the facility.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastSync.description: The timestamp of the most recent data sync.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Message.description: The message returned if an error occurred during the data sync.

Name.description: Name of the provider search sync log.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the record.

ProviderId.description: The ID of the healthcare organization or the practitioner.

ProviderName.description: The name of the healthcare provider.

SyncStatus.description: The status of the data sync.

PurchaserPlan.name: PurchaserPlan
PurchaserPlan.description: Represents the payer plan that a purchaser makes available to its members and members’ dependents.

Affiliation.description: An affiliation to a government service, such as the army or navy.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this purchaser plan is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this purchaser plan ceases to be effective.

IsVerifiable.description: Indicates whether a benefits verification can be performed on this plan.

LineOfBusiness.description: The category of insurance policy that the purchaser plan belongs to. For example, whether the plan is a group health insurance, individual health insurance, etc.

Name.description: The name of this plan.

Payer.description: The ID of the payer’s Account object record.

PlanStatus.description: Indicates whether the plan is active.

PlanType.description: The type of plan, with the following default options: PPO HMO Medicare Medicaid Workers Comp

ServiceType.description: The description of the service type offered by this plan.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the system this plan record came from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this plan record on its source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date on which this plan record was last changed on the source system.

SponsorType.description: The type of sponsor for the plan. For example, if it's self-sponsored, government-sponsored, or company-sponsored.

PurchaserPlanAssn.name: PurchaserPlanAssn
PurchaserPlanAssn.description: Represents a junction object that associates the purchaser to the plans they offer to members.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of this purchaser to purchaser plan association.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PurchaserId.description: The ID of the plan purchaser’s Account object record.

PurchaserPlanId.description: The ID of the associated plan on the Purchaser Plan object.

Role.description: Indicates whether the purchaser plays a primary or secondary role in the plan.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the system this record came from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this record on its source system.

SourceSystemModified.description: The date on which this item was last changed on the source system.

Status.description: Indicates whether this purchaser plan relationship is active.

ReceivedDocument.name: ReceivedDocument
ReceivedDocument.description: Contains a request for an operation to be performed on a document, such as rotating, splitting, or text extraction.

Direction.description: Specifies whether the org is receiving or sending the document.

HasAutoOcrDisabled.description: Determines whether text is extracted from the document automatically. Default is False.

IsActive.description: Specifies whether the document is being processed.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the received document.

OcrStatus.description: Current state of the text extraction process.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the ReceivedDocument record.

Priority.description: Determines the order in which the document is processed when it is part of a queue.

Source.description: Origin of the incoming document. Can be used to specify processing priority.

Status.description: Current stage of processing.

StatusReason.description: Reason for the status when processing and transforming the document.

ReceivedDocumentType.name: ReceivedDocumentType
ReceivedDocumentType.description: Represents a junction object between Received Document and Document Type.

DocumentTypeId.description: The ID of the document type for the document checklist item.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the received document type.

PageNumber.description: Page number of the received document.

ReceivedDocumentId.description: The ID of the received document for the received document type.

RecordAction.name: RecordAction
RecordAction.description: Represents a relationship between a record and an action, such as a flow. Create a RecordAction for every action that you want to associate with a particular record.

ActionDefinition.description: Required in Lightning Flow for Service implementations that use version 44.0 or later of the API. The API name of the action to associate with the record; for example, the API name of a flow. Use this field rather than FlowDefinition. To distinguish a quick action from a flow with the same API name, we prepend "QuickAction" to the API name of every quick action.

ActionType.description: Required in Lightning Flow for Service implementations that use version 46.0 or later of the API. The type of action. Possible values are: Flow (default) QuickAction For versions of the API prior to version 46.0, this field is set to Flow.

FlowDefinition.description: Optional in Lightning Flow for Service implementations using version 42.0 or 43.0 of the API. An upgrade to Winter '19 or later, which uses API version 44.0 or later, copies FlowDefinition to ActionDefinition. For versions 42.0 and 43.0, this field is the API name of the flow that’s associated with the record.

FlowInterviewId.description: Optional. The flow interview ID of the paused or completed flow. This field can’t be set in Process Builder.

IsMandatory.description: Optional. Specifies whether the action is mandatory. The default value is false. Note At runtime, we show a reminder when the user closes a mandatory flow without completing it. We don't show the reminder for quick actions.

IsUiRemoveHidden.description: Optional. Specifies whether the ability to remove the action is hidden in the UI. The default value is false. If true, the UI hides the ability to remove the action. However, actions can still be deleted using the API.

Order.description: Required. The order of the action among all actions associated with this record.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The participant role that's associated with the record action.

Pinned.description: Required. Specifies whether the action is pinned to the top or bottom of the component. If an action is pinned, users see the Remove option in the UI unless IsUiRemoveHidden is set to true. Possible values are: None (default) Top Bottom

RecordId.description: Required. Record associated with the action. In version 46.0 and above, we support most object types. To learn about supported objects, see the Lightning Flow for Service Developer’s Guide.

Status.description: Required. The current state of the action. Possible values are: New (default) Paused Complete Started Unlinked—The action was unlinked because the flow was paused and the current record for the flow interview changed. Paused and unlinked statuses do not apply to quick actions. This field can’t be set in Process Builder.

ScheduleBrdcstApptResource.name: ScheduleBrdcstApptResource
ScheduleBrdcstApptResource.description: Represents a junction between a Schedule Broadcast Appointment and a Service Resource. This object represents the resources to whom a schedule broadcast is sent.

AppointmentStatus.description: The status of the appointment that's broadcasted to the resource.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record.

ResourceReferenceId.description: The resource to whom the schedule broadcast appointment is sent.

ScheduleBroadcastAppointmentId.description: The schedule broadcast appointment associated with the schedule broadcast appointment resource.

ScheduleBroadcast.name: ScheduleBroadcast
ScheduleBroadcast.description: Represents a broadcast of appointments that's sent to resources of specific service territories.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record.

Status.description: The status of the schedule broadcast.

ScheduleBroadcastAppointment.name: ScheduleBroadcastAppointment
ScheduleBroadcastAppointment.description: Represents appointments that schedulers broadcast to resources using a schedule broadcast.

Address.description: The address of the appointment where the home visit is performed.

AppointmentReferenceId.description: The appointment associated with the schedule broadcast appointment.

City.description: The city of the appointment address.

Country.description: The country of the appointment address.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the appointment.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the address’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

IsAccepted.description: Indicates whether a care resource has accepted the appointment (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Latitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address.

Longitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the record.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of the appointment address.

ScheduleBroadcastId.description: The schedule broadcast associated with the schedule broadcast appointment.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the appointment.

State.description: The state of the appointment address.

Street.description: The street of the appointment address.

WorkTypeId.description: The work type associated with the schedule broadcast appointment.

ScheduleBroadcastTerritory.name: ScheduleBroadcastTerritory
ScheduleBroadcastTerritory.description: Represent service territories to which a schedule broadcast is sent.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

ScheduleBroadcastId.description: The parent schedule broadcast associated with the schedule broadcast territory.

ServiceTerritoryId.description: The service territory associated with the schedule broadcast.

ServiceAppointmentAsset.name: ServiceAppointmentAsset
ServiceAppointmentAsset.description: Represents a junction between Service Appointment and Asset. This junction object enables admins to associate a patient appointment to an asset such as a piece of medical equipment.

AssetId.description: Required. The asset associated with the service appointment.

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether the asset is required for the appointment (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the service appointment asset record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the record.

ServiceAppointmentId.description: Required. The service appointment associated with the asset.

ServiceAppointmentGroup.name: ServiceAppointmentGroup
ServiceAppointmentGroup.description: Stores information about a group of related service appointments.

AppointmentGroupType.description: Specifies the type of appointment group associated with the service appointment group.

Description.description: Stores information about the service appointment group.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the service appointment group.

OwnerId.description: ID of the record owner.

ReferenceRecordId.description: Represents the record associated with the service appointment group.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the service appointment group.

StatusCode.description: Specifies the status code used for scheduling the service appointment group.

WorkProcedureId.description: The ID of the work procedure associated with the service appointment group.

ServiceInfoRequestDetail.name: ServiceInfoRequestDetail
ServiceInfoRequestDetail.description: Represents additional details about a service information request, such as the detail type and detail code.

DetailCodeId.description: The code for the issue encountered while processing the request.

DetailCodeType.description: Specifies the type of issue encountered while processing the request.

DetailType.description: Specifies the type of detail added to the service information request. For example, an issue encountered while processing the request.

DetailValue.description: The value of the detail type. For example, the assertion ID when the detail type is Assertion Identifier.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

ServiceInfoRequestOperation.name: ServiceInfoRequestOperation
ServiceInfoRequestOperation.description: Represents the system operation performed for a service information request such as a session launch or a questionnaire package operation.

InitiatedDateTime.description: The date and time when the operation was initiated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OperationType.description: The system operation performed for the service information request.

QuestionnaireUrl.description: The canonical URL of the questionnaire associated with the service information request operation.

ResponseDateTime.description: The date and time when the response for the operation was sent.

ResponseStatusCode.description: The status code of the response.

ServiceInformationRequestId.description: The service information request associated with the operation.

ServiceInfoResponseAction.name: ServiceInfoResponseAction
ServiceInfoResponseAction.description: Represents actions to be performed as suggested by a service information response.

Context.description: The context in which the action is performed.

ContextIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the context.

Description.description: The description of the service information response action.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the record.

ResponseReferenceRecordId.description: The record of the object that's related to the service information response action.

Type.description: Specifies the type of action to be performed.

ServiceInfoResponseCoverage.name: ServiceInfoResponseCoverage
ServiceInfoResponseCoverage.description: Represents coverage details about a service information response. For example, if additional information or documentation is required for the coverage to be provided.

CoverageAssertionIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the coverage assertion.

CoverageIndicator.description: Specifies if the requested service is covered under the insurance plan.

CoveragePlanTypeId.description: Specifies the type of plan the coverage assertion falls under.

DocRequiredReason.description: Specifies why the additional documentation is required for coverage to be provided.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

MemberPlanId.description: The member plan associated with the service information response coverage.

RequiredDocumentationType.description: Specifies the type of additional documentation required for coverage to be provided.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: A human-readable name for the URL.

Url.description: The URL that loads the resource.

ServiceInfoRespSuggestion.description: Represents suggestions in a service information response. For example, suggesting a change in medication dosage.

ServiceInformationRequest.name: ServiceInformationRequest
ServiceInformationRequest.description: Represents information about a service information request, such as the date and time when the request was submitted and the type of service requested.

AccessTokenUsageStatus.description: Indicates the usage status of the access token that was sent with the request.

Name.description: The name of the record.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the record.

RecipientOrgIdentifierId.description: The unique identifier of the organization to whom the request was sent.

RequesterOrgExtlIdentifier.description: The identifier of the organization that sent the request, as recorded in an external system.

ServiceInformationResponse.name: ServiceInformationResponse
ServiceInformationResponse.description: Represents a response to a service information request.

AdditionalNote.description: Additional information related to the response.

FocusType.description: Specifies the types of data the response focuses on.

Identifier.description: The unique identifier of the response.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

ReferenceSourceIconUrl.description: The URL to the icon representing the source of information of the response. The icon should be a 100x100 pixel PNG image without any transparent region.

ReferenceSourceName.description: The name of the source of information for the response.

ReferenceSourceUrl.description: The URL to the source of information for the response.

ResponseEngagementStatus.description: Specifies the engagement status of the response.

ResponseType.description: Specifies the type of service information response. For example, card or system action.

ServiceInformationRequestId.description: The service information request for which the response is sent.

ServiceInfoRqstOpOutcome.description: Represents the outcome of a service information request operation.

SharedSavingPaymentAgreement.name: SharedSavingPaymentAgreement
SharedSavingPaymentAgreement.description: Specifies the payment terms for contracts of Shared Saving Payment Agreement type.
