ProfitPlanDescription.description: The description of the shared savings payment agreement when a profit is attained.

QualifyingProfitPercentage.description: The minimum profit percentage to be reached to share the profit.

SkillType.name: SkillType
SkillType.description: Represents the broader type or category that a skill belongs to.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the object in the API. This name can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters, and must be unique in your org. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores. In managed packages, this field prevents naming conflicts on package installations. With this field, a developer can change the object’s name in a managed package and the changes are reflected in a subscriber’s organization.

Language.description: The language of the define skill type.

MasterLabel.description: The name of the skill type.

StandardCareFeeAgreement.name: StandardCareFeeAgreement
StandardCareFeeAgreement.description: Specifies the payment terms for contracts of Standard Care Fee Agreement type.

ContractPaymentAgreementId.description: The contract payment agreement record to which this standard care fee agreement is associated.

FacilityPrice.description: The fees when the procedure is performed in a facility location such as a hospital or Ambulatory Surgical Center (ASC).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the standard care fee agreement.

NonFacilityPrice.description: The fees when the procedure is performed in a non-facility location such as the physician's office.

ProcedureCodeDescription.description: The description of the procedure code.

ProcedureCodeId.description: The industry standard code for the procedure such as CPT or HCPCS.

StdCareFeeAgreementKey.description: A unique key assigned to the Standard Care Fee Agreement record.

SvcInfoRelatedQuestionnaire.name: SvcInfoRelatedQuestionnaire
SvcInfoRelatedQuestionnaire.description: Represents the questionnaire associated with a service information request or service information response coverage.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

SvcInfoRespCoverageDetail.name: SvcInfoRespCoverageDetail
SvcInfoRespCoverageDetail.description: Represents additional coverage details about a service information response.

DetailValue.description: The value of the detail type when the detail type is Assertion Identifier.

DetailValueDataType.description: The data type of the detail value.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the record.

ServiceInfoResponseCoverageId.description: The service information response coverage that the additional details are captured for.

Team.name: Team
Team.description: Represents the team of members associated with an organization.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the team.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

TeamMember.name: TeamMember
TeamMember.description: Represents the member associated with a team.

TimePeriod.name: TimePeriod
TimePeriod.description: Represents the time period that's used to calculate the indicator performance and result.

EndDate.description: The end date and time of the time period.

LastReferencedDate.description: Date and time when a user last referenced this time period.

LastViewedDate.description: Date and time when a user last viewed this time period.

Name.description: The name of the time period.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns the time period.

StartDate.description: The start date and time of the time period.

TrackedCommunication.name: TrackedCommunication
TrackedCommunication.description: Stores information request or communication details sent from payer to provider on a member’s authorization request.

CommunicatorReferenceId.description: The account or contact that's sending this communication.

ContextReferenceId.description: The context that's associated with the communication.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the tracked communication.

OccurrenceEndDateTime.description: The date and time by when the communication is expected to occur.

OccurrenceStartDateTime.description: The date and time from when the communication is expected to occur.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Priority.description: Specifies the priority of the communication.

Status.description: Specifies the communication status.

StatusReason.description: The reason for the status of the communication.

SubjectId.description: The patient for whom the communication is created.

TrackedCommunicationDetail.name: TrackedCommunicationDetail
TrackedCommunicationDetail.description: Stores additional information associated with TrackedCommunication records.

DetailCodeId.description: The code set or code set bundle that contains the information to be added to the tracked communication record. Select a detail code when the specified detail type is Category, Medium, Reason Code, or Payload.

DetailRecordId.description: The record that contains the information to be added to the tracked communication record. Select the record based on the detail type you’ve specified.

DetailType.description: Specifies the type of information that you’re adding to the tracked communication record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the tracked communication detail.

TrackedCommunicationId.description: The parent tracked communication record you're adding information to.

UnitOfMeasure.name: UnitOfMeasure
UnitOfMeasure.description: Represents the unit of measures for care metrics and care observations

ConversionFactor.description: The factor or rate that's used to convert this unit of measurement to the base unit.

Sequence.description: The sequence number assigned to the unit of measure.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the unit of measure.

UnitCode.description: The code for this unit of measure. For example, mm[Hg], mcg/mL., kgs, lbs.

UnitOfMeasureClassId.description: The class associated with the unit of measurement.

Visit.description: Track information related to a field rep’s visit to a health care provider.

ActualVisitEndTime.description: The date and time when the visit ended.

ActualVisitStartTime.description: The date and time when the visit started.

LikeCount.description: The number of likes associated with this feed item.

NetworkScope.description: Specifies whether this feed item is available in the default Experience Cloud site, a specific Experience Cloud site, or all sites. This field is available in API version 26.0 and later, if digital experiences is enabled for your org. NetworkScope can have the following values: NetworkId—The ID of the Experience Cloud site in which the FeedItem is available. If left empty, the feed item is only available in the default Experience Cloud site. AllNetworks—The feed item is available in all Experience Cloud sites. Note the following exceptions for NetworkScope: Only feed items with a Group or User parent can set a NetworkId or a null value for NetworkScope. For feed items with a record parent, users can set NetworkScope only to AllNetworks. You can’t filter a feed item on the NetworkScope field.

ParentId.description: ID of the record that is tracked in the feed. The detail page for the record displays the feed.

Visibility.description: Specifies whether this feed item is available to all users or internal users only. This field is available if Salesforce Communities are enabled for your organization. Visibility can have the following values: AllUsers—The feed item is available to all users who have permission to see the feed item. InternalUsers—The feed item is available to internal users only. Note the following exceptions for Visibility: For record posts, Visibility is set to InternalUsers for all internal users by default. External users can set Visibility only to AllUsers. On user and group posts, only internal users can set Visibility to InternalUsers.

WorkProcedure.name: WorkProcedure
WorkProcedure.description: Represent information about a procedure or process that's part of a program, such as a care program in Health Cloud or Life Sciences Cloud.

AssociatedFlowOrchestratorName.description: The API name of the flow orchestrator associated with the work procedure.

Description.description: The description of the work procedure.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

LeadTimeUnitType.description: The unit of measure for the lead time required to complete the work procedure.

Name.description: The name of the work procedure.

OwnerId.description: ID of the record owner.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The record ID of the object associated with this work procedure.

WorkProcedureStep.name: WorkProcedureStep
WorkProcedureStep.description: Represent information about the work type that's a part of a work procedure.

AssociatedFlowName.description: Represents the flow definition that associated with the work procedure step.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

LeadTime.description: The time required before a work procedure step can begin.

LeadTimeUnitType.description: The unit of measure used to calculate the lead time.

Name.description: The name of the work procedure step.

SequenceNumber.description: Indicates the sequence in which the work type will be performed.

WorkTypeId.description: The work type that's associated with the work procedure step.

WorkTypeAssetType.description: Represents a junction between Work Type and Asset Type. This junction object enables admins to associate a visit type such as PRP Hair Restoration to an asset type such as Room.

AssetTypeId.description: Required. The asset type associated with a work type.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the work type asset type record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the record.

WorkTypeId.description: Required. The work type associated with an asset type.

WorkTypeCareSpecialty.name: WorkTypeCareSpecialty
WorkTypeCareSpecialty.description: Represents a relationship between a care specialty and a visit type (Work Type).

CareSpecialtyId.description: The care speciality associated with the work type.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time that the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time that the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the WorkTypeCareSpecialty record.

WorkTypeId.description: The work type that the specialty is associated with. This is the parent record of the work type care specialty.

WorkTypeCodeSetBundle.name: WorkTypeCodeSetBundle
WorkTypeCodeSetBundle.description: Represents a relationship between visit type (Work Type) and code set bundles that represent the service and appointment details for the visit type.

AppointmentTypeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the type of appointment associated with the visit type (work type) and service.

FlowName.description: The name of the internal flow that's invoked when the visit type (work type) is selected.

HasPrerequisitesCheckInFlow.description: Indicates whether the flow associated with the work type code set bundle checks prerequisites (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the WorkTypeCodeSetBundle record.

ParentId.description: The parent visit type (work type) that the code sets for service and appointment details are associated with. The value for this field is unique across your org in records. That means you can’t have multiple WorkTypeCodeSetBundle records for the same WorkType record.

SchedulingSystem.description: Specifies the scheduling system that's used to schedule an appointment.

ServiceCategoryId.description: The system-defined code that represents the category of service associated with the visit type (Work Type).

ServiceTypeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the type of service associated with the visit type (Work Type).

WorkTypeExtension.name: WorkTypeExtension
WorkTypeExtension.description: Represent additional information about a work type.

IconUrl.description: The URL of the image related to the work type.

IsNonStandard.description: Indicates whether the work type is nonstandard, that is, the work type can also be performed at child service territories that aren’t part of the parent service territory.The default value is FALSE.

IsSchedulingRequired.description: Indicates whether a work type requires scheduling.The default value is FALSE.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the work type extension.

ParentWorkTypeId.description: Represents the parent record of the work type for which information is being added.

WorkTypeId.description: Represents the work type for which information is being added.

WorkTypeStep.name: WorkTypeStep

ActionPlanTemplateId.description: The action plan template associated with the work type step.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

LeadTime.description: The lead time required, in hours or days, to complete the work type step.

Name.description: The name of the work type step record.

ParentWorkTypeId.description: The work type associated with the step.

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence number in which the work type step is performed.

WorkTypeStepLdTimeOvride.description: Represents the lead time that's used to override the default lead time required for the work procedure, work type, or work type step that's performed at a service territory in a country.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the work type step lead time override record.

ServiceTerritoryId.description: The service territory for which priority is being defined.

WorkProcedureId.description: The work procedure for which priority is being defined.

WorkTypeId.description: The work type for which priority is being defined.

WorkTypeStepId.description: The work type step for which priority is being defined.

WorkTypeSvcTerrSchdPrio.name: WorkTypeSvcTerrSchdPrio
WorkTypeSvcTerrSchdPrio.description: Represents the priority of the combination of the service territory, work type, and work procedure while fetching appointment slots.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the work type service territory scheduling priority record.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the work type service territory scheduling priority record.

ParentServiceTerritoryId.description: Represents the parent service territory condition for which priority is being defined.

Priority.description: The combined priority of all the conditions for a service territory.

ServiceTerritoryId.description: Represents the service territory condition for which priority is being defined.

UsageType.description: The usage type of the scheduling priority in an application or cloud. For internal use only.

WorkTypeId.description: Represents the work type condition for which priority is being defined.
